global_seq: We have a holiday next week, don't we? Yes, on Monday. What're you going to do? I'm probably going to spend the day looking at cars.
local_seq: At cars! You aren't thinking about buying a car, are you?

global_seq: Yes, I am. I'd like to be able to get around a little more. But it will be expensive to have a car in the city, won't it? Oh, I don't know. Of course, gasoline costs a lot these days. But what about parking? You can't park on the street, can you?
local_seq: A lot of people do. I'll try it for a while anyway, but I certainly don't want to pay a lot of parking tickets.

global_seq: I need to get internet. Which kind of internet connection do you want to get? What kind can I get? There is dial-up or DEL.
local_seq: Which one do you feel is best?

global_seq: I would get DEL if I were you. DEL is better than dial-up? It's the best choice ; plus, it won't tie up your phone line. I'm not sure what that means.
local_seq: Dial-up is connected through your phone, unlike DEL.

global_seq: How many people are traveling with you today, miss? Just me. I'm traveling alone. And how many bags do you have? Just one carry-on and one that I want to check.
local_seq: You must be going to some island to relax in the sun where all you need is a swim suit and a toothbrush.

global_seq: Thank God, it's Friday! Time for a drink! Let's hit the bars! OK. I don't mind going bar hopping with an expert like you. Should we start with beer or wine or go straight to the hard liquor? I think I'll have a glass of wine. Let's see... they have red wine, white wine and port. They even have sangria! It's the happy hour special.
local_seq: Port's too sweet. It's a dessert wine. A dry red French wine would be nice with meat. A glass of chilled white German wine would be good with fish. But, we're not eating and it's hot out, so I think I'll have a tall glass of sangria with ice.

global_seq: I'd like to have these shirts washed and ironed. Ok, do you want us to use starch? Yes, heavy starch in the collar, please. Yes, sir. Your shirts will be ready by Thursday morning. Anything else?
local_seq: I also have a suit to be dry-cleaned. Can I fetch it the day after tomorrow? It's urgent.

global_seq: No problem, sir. Could you please tell me when your laundry opens and closes? We remain open from 9am till 8p m. I see.
local_seq: Here is your laundry ticket, sir.

global_seq: Thank you. I'd like to get my laundry. Yes, sir. May I have your laundry ticket, please? Here you are. Yes, they are ready to go.
local_seq: Can you sew on these buttons?

global_seq: No problem. How much for the shirts? 10 dollars. Here is the money, keep the change.
local_seq: Thank you, bye.

global_seq: are you ready for the meeting? yes, come on in. how's your new job going? it's challenging, but I'm enjoying it quite a bit. that's great. I knew you'd do a good job as a manager.
local_seq: thanks a lot.

global_seq: how's your assistant manager getting on? well, that's part of the problem. His probation period is up tomorrow and I don't think he's ready to pass. what seems to be the problem? well, he was supposed to be able to learn his job in 30 days, but he just doesn't seem to know what he's doing.
local_seq: if you gave him another 30 days, do you think he could figure it out by then?

global_seq: to be honest, he has no authority. He's a hard-worker, but no one listens to him. I see. Not everyone is cut out to work in management. I know. It'd be great if we could transfer him to a department where he doesn't have to work with people. there's an opening in the creative design department. It involves working with computers.
local_seq: that's perfect. I'll let him know tomorrow. Thanks!

global_seq: Waiter, bring me the menu, will you? Just a moment, I'm coming.Now, what would you like? I'd like to see the menu.Would you get me one, please? Yes, certainly.Here you are.
local_seq: Thank you.Ah! But this is in French.Would you mind giving me the English menu?

global_seq: It's written in English too, in smaller print.There. Thanks. I'll need a while to choose.Could you come back in a minute? Right.Now, what are you having? I'm sorry, I haven't decided yet.Do you mind giving me a couple of minutes?
local_seq: All right, but would you be so kind as to make up your mind soon? We're very busy just now as you can see, sir.

global_seq: Lucy, where are you going? I want to go to the supermarket. Wait a few minutes and I'll go there with you. Let's get a shopping cart.
local_seq: Good idea

global_seq: What are you going to buy? Let's check out the fruit section first. OK. I'd like some oranges. But they don't look quite ripe yet. Look, nice fresh cherries! They are ripe and soft. I'll take some.
local_seq: I'll take some, too.

global_seq: Please take a seat. Thanks. Now what can I do for you? Well, I'm looking for a job.
local_seq: Fine, but first I need some information about you.

global_seq: What kind of information do you want? Well, first of all, your name.What ' s your surname? Wilson. And your other names?
local_seq: Steven Michael.

global_seq: Have you got your e-mail address? Yes, It's Henrylee@yahoo.com. How old are you? Twenty-one.
local_seq: Where were you Bron?

global_seq: Excuse me. How much for one are these? Un.. Those are 25 dollars each. OK. Say I was to buy four, could I get a discount? Well, I could offer you maybe 10 percent off.
local_seq: Oh, I was hoping to get one free. Like four for 75 dollars.

global_seq: Good afternoon madam. What can I do for you? Hi. I want to check out. My room is 1005. OK. Please hold on a minute. So you checked in on Monday and stayed 3 nights in single room 1005. Is that right? Yes. Can I have a look at my bill?
local_seq: OK. Here you are. If there are no questions, could we have your signature in the blank below?

global_seq: Well, we've settled everything in connection with this transaction except the question of the mode of payment. Because this order is a comparatively big one, we would like to pay by time L / C, say, 60 days L / C. Payment by sight L / C is quite usual in international trade, and as a rule, we only accept payment by sight L / C. But we have only moderate mean at hand. If you can do us a special favor this time and allow us to delay payment, we'd really appreciate it.
local_seq: Accepting time L / C is unusual and I've never done it before, but we could consider your request. I'll phone our company to see what they say.

global_seq: Good afternoon. I suppose you are Ms. Monica. My name is Mr. Thomas, the general manager of ABC Company. Here is my business card. Thank you very much. I am very impressed by your resume. Therefore, I am very interested to know why you’ re willing to leave your current company. I am looking for a more challenging position. I can’ t grow anymore in my current job.
local_seq: Ok, I understand. But why you choose us to work for?

global_seq: I have studied carefully the information about your company on the internet and I have checked your company’ s homepage. I am impressed by the company. And I like the products a lot. Since you’ re growing steadily, I would be very eager to help you to improve your accounting system. How do you work with a team? I work quite well with a team. I’ m a good team player. I respect people, cooperate well with member’ s team. And I will do my best to help team members. What’ s your long term goal?
local_seq: I’ d like to bring to ABC Company not only my technical skills, ambition, enthusiasm, but also my loyalty. A sincere desire to become an administrative assistant is the heart of my career plans.

global_seq: Do you take reservations? Of course. Reservations aren't necessary, but we recommend them as our restaurant can get quite busy. I need a table for two for tonight. What time?
local_seq: We'd like to be seated at 8p m.

global_seq: Smoking or non? Non-smoking. What name is the reservation under? My name is Paul.
local_seq: Ok. Please arrive at seven forty-five. We can only hold the table until 8,15.

global_seq: Hello, sir. Can I help you? Yes. I want to apply for a job you posted on the Internet yesterday. What’ s the job title? Service Technician. How can I apply for this position?
local_seq: You need to fill out an Application Form.

global_seq: Hello, may I speak with the property manager, please? Hello, this is the property manager. How may I help you? During that horrible rainstorm last night, my roof began to leak. What room was the leak in?
local_seq: It was in our bedroom.

global_seq: Are you on the top floor, or is there another apartment above you? We are on the top floor. I will be sending someone out as soon as I can get hold of the roofer. Will you be home this morning? Yes, we will be in.
local_seq: Fine. If you do end up going somewhere, we can just use our pass key.

global_seq: Your total comes to $ 36.78. Put it on my VISA. There’ s a problem with your card. What’ s wrong with it?
local_seq: I believe it was declined.

global_seq: You’ re kidding me! Do you have another card I could try? I only have one card. Do you have cash, perhaps?
local_seq: I don’ t have any cash on me.

global_seq: May I take your order now, sir? Yes, please. I'd like to start with a chef’ s salad. Chef’ s salad for starter. And what would you like to have for the main course? I'll have steak.
local_seq: How would you like your steak done?

global_seq: Medium. And what would you like to go with your steak? Peas and carrots. Potatoes?
local_seq: Boiled.

global_seq: What seems to be the problem? My stomach hurts, Doctor. Has this been a problem before? Yes.
local_seq: For how long?

global_seq: I have had it on and off for the past three years. It's just gotten much worse these past two weeks. Do you only feel this way when you stomach is empty? After I've eaten, it goes away for a while. Do you feel nauseous?
local_seq: Yes, occasionally.

global_seq: Do you have regular bowel movements? I think so. Let me take a look at your abdomen. Lie down on your back and bend your knees up. OK. relax... Alright, it seems like you have a duodenal ulcer, but we'll have to run some tests before I can be certain. You should get a good rest first and try not to strain your stomach too much. Is it serious?
local_seq: Not too serious, but it'll take you some time to recover, so you'll need to be patient.

global_seq: I need to pay the fine on my ticket. Do you have the ticket with you? Yes, I have my ticket with me. Let me see your ID.
local_seq: I forgot to bring that with me.

global_seq: You need it to pay your fine. Why can't I just give you the money for the fine? Because, I need to see a photo ID in order to verify who you are. Okay, I think I understand.
local_seq: All right, come back and bring your ID.

global_seq: Laura, what are you going to do today? I'm going shopping. What time are you leaving? I'm going to leave around 4 O'clock.
local_seq: Will you buy a ham sandwich for me at the store?

global_seq: OK. Do you have enough money? I'm not sure. How much do you have?
local_seq: 25 dollars. Do you think that's enough?

global_seq: That's not very much. I think it's OK. I also have two credit cards. Let me give you another ten dollars. Thanks. See you later.
local_seq: Bye.

global_seq: Is there anything I can do for you? Yes, I'd like to buy a color TV. We carry products from three large manufacturers and some imported ones, too. Do you have a specific model in mind? No. Which one do you recommend?
local_seq: This one from Sony gives a very sharp picture.

global_seq: Can I help you? Yes.When is the next train to New York City? Let me see... the train to New York City... here it is... daily except Sunday at ten thirty, twelve twenty and fifteen ten. Aren't there any trains before ten thirty?
local_seq: Sorry, not before ten thirty.

global_seq: Then one to New York at ten thirty. One way or round trip? One way. A soft seat or hard one?
local_seq: How much is a soft?

global_seq: Honey, could you help me operate the VD player? It can't play. Oh, are the connections correct? I think so. Let me see. Look! You confused the video frequency with the audio frequency.
local_seq: I'm too careless.

global_seq: Can it work now? No. So what's the problem? Maybe there is something wrong with the disk. It's a new disk.
local_seq: Give it to me.

global_seq: What did you buy at the market? I bought some special local products. You seem to have bought the whole market! Yes. I really wanted to do so. I love those handicrafts, especially the paper-cut.
local_seq: Paper-cuts are all hand-made. Let me see the paper-cuts you bought. They are all animals.

global_seq: Aren't animals the main content of Chinese paper-cuts? All right. Animals, especially Chinese zodiac, are the most common theme in paper-cuts. But there are other themes. Then I will buy some tomorrow. Why do you want to buy so much?
local_seq: Because I want to send them to my friends.

global_seq: Hello, Sir. We haven't seen you for quite a while. So, what is it today that we can do for you? I need a Deposit Certificate to handle some stuff in land. I see, yes, I can do that now. I'm sure you know, as I may have told you before, you should pay an extra 20 RIB handling fee for this service. Yes, I recalled you charging that before. And I thought it was extortionate! Haha!
local_seq: I can just take it from your account, you don't need to give me cash.

global_seq: Have you finished washing clothes? I've finished my white clothes. I need to wash the rest. Well, when you do your darks, can you wash some of mine too? I can do that. Is there a special way you want them washed?
local_seq: They need to be washed on the gentle cycle.

global_seq: Do you have a lot of clothes that need to be washed? There aren't many clothes, is your load big? My load isn't that big. If it's a problem, you don't have to do it for me.
local_seq: I can do this for you. Don't worry.

global_seq: What color is your new dress? It is green. Come upstairs and see it. Thanks you. Look! Here it is!
local_seq: That’ s a nice dress. It’ s very smart.

global_seq: Good morning, Mr. Smith. Good morning, Jamie. What time is it now? It is 9 o'clock now. I see. What is today's schedule?
local_seq: You have two meetings today. One is at 10 am, and the other is at 2 pm. After the meeting, you will have dinner with Mr. Brown at the Chinese restaurant in Sister Hotel.

global_seq: OK. Can you prepare things for the meeting in the meeting room? Make enough copies of the handouts. No problem. Do you need the OHP? Yes. I am going to show them some slides in the meeting. Can you call Mr. Brown to remind him of the dinner this evening? OK. Do you want to ask the receptionist to wait for our customers at the receptionist counter before the meeting?
local_seq: That would be great! You are really a good employee.

global_seq: Here we are, Ryan! This is where we're going to celebrate! lt's a TV palace! I'm glad I brought my platinum card. You won't need it. Tom is going to treat everybody! Where is Tom? It was his idea to have the bachelor party at a ETV, wasn't it?
local_seq: If it were up to Tom, we'd have the wedding in the ETV? He loves to sing.

global_seq: Then I bet he's really good! Well, uh, I'll let you decided that for you yourself. He'll be here a little later. Here's our room. This is where we sing? These booths are so comfortable I think could fall asleep! Let's order something to eat. What are you in the mood for?
local_seq: It's up to you.

global_seq: Here I raise a question for you. Just imagine we will have a foreign guest from Japan. Can you tell me how I ought to be to the most comfortable and polite? Firstly, we can provide our meeting agenda before he comes. And then on the day when he is coming, we wait for him at the gate of our company's gate. Well, that's right. How about on a formal occasion? What should I say to show my gratitude? It's an honor and a privilege to receive a visit from such a distinguished group.
local_seq: And then, what should we do next when you meet the guests?

global_seq: May I help you? Yes, I would like to return these slacks. Alright. Do you have your receipt? Yes. Here it is. I bought them last week.
local_seq: And why are you returning them?

global_seq: I bought them to go with a blouse of mine. But they don't really match. I see. Oh, wait. Ma'am, I'm sorry. These slacks were on sale. Yes, they were thirty percent off. I'm sorry, but we don't allow returns on sale items.
local_seq: I know many stores have that policy. But I have returned sale items here before.

global_seq: I'm sorry, but we usually don't do it. It is our policy. I just bought these slacks a week ago. And I am a regular customer here. Can you make an exception this time? Well. Let me talk to the manager for a moment. Madam, the manager says can do it this time. Good. I'm a regular customer here. I am glad you can make an exception for me.
local_seq: Please show me your receipt again.

global_seq: Good morning, my name is Martin. You've applied for the Laboratory Assistant's position, right? Yes. When I saw the advertisement I thought it would really suit me. Can you tell me why you replied to our advertisement? I think that I'll be really good at this kind of work. In fact I learn so fast that I'll be looking for promotion very shortly.
local_seq: Do you know exactly what you would be doing as a Laboratory Assistant?

global_seq: A laboratory assistant helps to maintain scientific equipment, keep a check on the supplies in the store, and prepare the chemicals for experiments. What sort of student do you regard yourself as? Did you enjoy studying while you were at school? I suppose I'm a reasonable student. I passed all my tests and enjoyed studying subjects that interested me. What were your favorite subjects at school?
local_seq: Maths and chemistry were my favorite subjects at school. I also enjoyed history.

global_seq: Do you have any plans for further study? Well, I've thought about doing the part-time Chemistry Certificate course at Technical College. I think I would really benefit from doing that. Have you ever had a job before? Yes. I have worked part-time at a take away food store-the one just round the corner.
local_seq: We have a lot of other applicants for this position. Why do you think that you deserve to get the job?

global_seq: Well, I've found out a lot about this type of work and my research suggests that I would be quite capable of doing the work involved. I also think that I would be able to handle any training course reasonably well. I think I have asked you everything I wanted to. Thank you for coming along to the interview. Thank you. When will I know if I am successful? We'll be in touch with you by telephone or by mail within a week. Well. Goodbye.
local_seq: Goodbye.

global_seq: Good morning! Can I speak to Miss Cooper please? Would you hold on a second, please? Miss Cooper's extension is engaged. Engaged.Oh, dear! Could you tell her it's a long-distance call?
local_seq: I'm sorry, sir. I can't interrupt her. I'm sure she won't be very long.

global_seq: How long do you think she'll be? I really can't say how long she'll be. Can I leave a message, please? Yes, certainly.
local_seq: Can you tell her I'm waiting to speak to her?

global_seq: I want to buy some jewellery. What kind of jewellery do you like to have? I should like to look at some bracelets. May I show you gold ones or platinum ones?
local_seq: Gold ones.

global_seq: Pure gold or carats? Pure gold ones, please. This is so beautiful. I'll take it. OK. How much is it?
local_seq: 1336 yuan.

global_seq: Hello, May I help you? Yes, we're interested in seeing the rooms for rent. Oh, how nice! there are bright rooms and the house is very quiet. That is exactly what we're looking for.
local_seq: Well, each room is 40 dollars a week.

global_seq: That sounds all right to us. When do you want to move in? How about tomorrow afternoon? Fine, I'll be expecting you.
local_seq: See you tomorrow.

global_seq: So, who do you work for? I work for a large multinational company called DAK Group. We have five main area of business - construction, heavy industry, shipbuilding, motor vehicles and telecommunications. And which side of the business do you work in? The motor vehicles division. I work in our Belgian factory. We manufacture components for our car production plants in Europe.
local_seq: Where are DAK headquarters?

global_seq: Now, madam, here is the Hotel. What's the fare? $ 15. The fare is different from the meter.
local_seq: Well, madam, the meter was not on at all. You didn't tell me.

global_seq: I wonder if you can help me. I'm looking for a room. Yes. I've got a small room. How much is it? 200 yuan a week, but smoking is not allowed.
local_seq: OK.Can I see the room now?

global_seq: IMPF Bank, Li Lan speaking, how may I help you? Hello, Ms Li, this is Mr Peng. Hello, Mr Peng, how nice to hear from you again. What can I do for you today? We'll be coming in tomorrow to make a rather large cash withdrawal, it's for payroll.
local_seq: I see. How much exactly?

global_seq: Hello. Excuse me. Do you know if there's a Commercial Bank around here? Yes, go straight along Beijing Road and turn right. Straight on, and turn right. Is it far? No, it's just a couple of minutes.
local_seq: Thanks very much.

global_seq: Hello. I would like to buy some business cards. Excellent. How many would you like? Two thousand would be fine. You need to fill out this form, please.
local_seq: All I want is the same thing on this card.

global_seq: That will be no problem, sir. ... Okay, I'm finished. Here's your form and my old card. Very good, sir. Your order will be ready in one week. Do you think you could finish it in three days?
local_seq: No problem, sir. But it will cost you extra.

global_seq: I've something very unpleasant to talk with you. Upon the arrival of the first consignment, it was found that about 50 % of the sixty cases of pineapples were leaking. It's rather an unusual case. Have you found the cause of leaking? It’ s simply because the tins were damaged. It appears to be the only case to us, that the goods have been damaged on the way.
local_seq: I am sorry to say it's not on the way, but during loading. The tins inside the cases were broken evidently through rough handling.

global_seq: Taxi. Get on, PLS. Where do you wanna go? Thank you. Pls hurry, I am late. Can I get to the Battery Park before 4? All right, Miss. I think we will get there if there are no delays on the way.
local_seq: How exactly do you figure out the car fare?

global_seq: According to the kilometer rate, the first five kilometers are 4 dollars and every kilometer extra costs 50 cents. Oh, I see. Here we are, Miss. Thank you. How much do I owe you?
local_seq: You owe me 19 dollars.

global_seq: Which school are you attending? I am attending Hebes University of Technology. When will you graduate from that university? This coming July.
local_seq: What degree will you receive?

global_seq: I will receive a Bachelor's degree. What is your major? My major is Business Administration. How have you been getting on with your studies so far?
local_seq: I have been doing quite well at college. According to the academic records I've achieved so far, I am confident that I will get my Bachelor of Business Administration this coming July.

global_seq: Excuse me, do you know where the Post Office is? Yes, it's not very far from here. Follow this road until you get to the traffic lights. You will see a small restaurant at the corner. Is the restaurant on the right or on the left hand side of the road? It is on the right. But it is on the other side of the lights.
local_seq: OK. Do I turn on the lights or do I go straight?

global_seq: You go straight on at the lights, but just past the restaurant building there is a small road to your right. And do I take that road? Yes, you need to turn right and follow that road for about four minutes. You will see the Post Office on your left. Is there a Post Office sign on the building?
local_seq: Yes and it is quite a big building so you won't miss it. There is also a small supermarket next to it.

global_seq: Can I help you, Madam? Yes. I'd like to buy a sweater for my husband. Which style is the latest? These are all the latest fashion. How do you like this white turtleneck one? I like this style. But do you have any other colors? I feel that this color doesn't suit his complexion.
local_seq: We also have it in grey.

global_seq: Hello, Sara are you finished packing yet? Do you need a hand? Thanks. Dad, but I can manage it myself. Make sure you have your ID card. You will need it while you travel. Yes, I know. The problem is that I can't find it. Where did you put it?
local_seq: All your important documents and certificates should be in the desk drawer.

global_seq: Oh, yes, here it is. Sara? What's up? Did you buy a map? Traveling can be really inconvenient without one, and you could even wind up lost
local_seq: No. Dad. We have a tour guide.

global_seq: Excuse me, please.Could you tell me how to get to the No. 10 Middle School? Walk down this road, take the fourth turn to the right.Then you'll see it. Is it far from here to there? No. It's only about five minutes ' walk.
local_seq: Many thanks!

global_seq: What else, Ma'am? No, thanks. My husband said, We'd like to pay now. Let me show you to the cashier's. It's 905 yuan in total. What? Where does that five come from?
local_seq: Oh, it's a service charge.

global_seq: But I only have 900 in cash here. Can you let it go for 900 yuan? Sorry, but we can't do that. It's store's rule. My husband said he had a credit card. Do you accept credit card? Yes.
local_seq: Great. Here it is.

global_seq: Excuse me. Can you show me some nail-polish? Yes. We have all kinds of colors for it. That's good. What's your favorite color?
local_seq: In my opinion, orange is very nice.

global_seq: What was that? Oh no. I broke your vase accidentally. How did it happen? I bumped it by accident, but I didn't mean to do it.
local_seq: It was my favorite.

global_seq: Good morning. Can I help you? Good morning. I would like to make a reservation to Hong Kong for August 2. Just a moment, please. I am sorry, sir. There is no ticket available on that day. But we have flights for Hong Kong the next day. May I inquire about the departure time?
local_seq: A 9:12 flight in the morning and a 14:00 flight in the afternoon.

global_seq: When will the plane reach Hong Kong for the morning flight? At 10:20 OK. I would like to book a ticket for that one. All right, sir. Please reconfirm your ticket no later than 12 noon two days before the flight ; otherwise, your reservation will automatically be canceled.
local_seq: Yes, I know. What's the fare?

global_seq: What kinds of meat are most popular in your country? We usually eat chicken, pork and beef. You eat these meats a lot in your country too, don't you? Yes, we do. We also eat mutton. I've heard that people in your country like mutton chops.
local_seq: That's right. Mutton chops taste so good. We eat them with sauce. Have you ever tried?

global_seq: Excuse me. Is anyone sitting here? No, nobody. You don’ t mind if I smoke, do you? Well, to be frank, yes, I do.
local_seq: Oh, I’ m sorry. But this isn’ t a no-smoker, isn’ t it? I mean would you mind if I smoke here?

global_seq: Actually it is. Perhaps you haven’ t noticed the sign. Sign? What’ s sign? There, on the window. Oh, sorry. I didn’ t notice it. Sorry.
local_seq: That’ s all right.

global_seq: Hi. I need a wake-up call tomorrow. What time would you like your wake-up call? I need two calls, one at 7 and another at 7 fifteen. That is no problem at all, of course. You'll get a call at 7 o'colock and another at 7 fifteen.
local_seq: Then again, I think 7 fifteen is too early. Change 7 fifteen to 7 thirty, please.

global_seq: Hello, this is Lucy from ABC Company. Hello, Lucy. I'm calling to see if you have made your decision. You are the right person we are seeking for. Yes, I have decided to work with your company.
local_seq: Good news for us. When can you start to work?

global_seq: Welcome. How can we be of service today? Hello. My aunt in the US has sent me $ 500. She sent it yesterday, using the standard service. It's my birthday today, you see. Well, happy birthday. If it was sent yesterday using the usual service, it should be here already. You do have an account with us, right? Yes. Here's my card. Do you need my ID?
local_seq: Please. Just to double check all the details.

global_seq: I'm glad I brought my jacket on this trip. Yes, I didn't know Washington, DC got so cold in winter. What would you like to do today? I really think we should take a tour of the White House.
local_seq: I thought we could go to some of the museums.Don ' t you want to see the museums?

global_seq: Can you assure the quality of this air conditioner? Yes, ma'ma. There'll be no problem with the quality. What if there's something wrong with it? You don't have to worry about it. We have a one year warranty.
local_seq: Are you sure?

global_seq: So how far is the museum, dad? It is about 10 minutes walk. Finish your hot chocolate and we will go. Are we going to come back here for lunch?
local_seq: No, we will have lunch at the museum cafeteria.

global_seq: I have finished. We can go now. Let's go then. On the way we have to turn right and right again at the next junction. Let's stop at the newsagent, I would like to buy a newspaper. We can also buy postcards for your friends. Can you see a Post Office somewhere around here?
local_seq: Yes it is down there, at the end of the road, next to the supermarket.

global_seq: Hello, Mr.Green. This is Lin Tong. How are you? Hi, Mr.Lin. I am leaving tomorrow and I am just packing. Oh, sorry to interrupt you. But I am calling to say goodbye to you. I am awfully sorry to tell you that I am afraid I could not see you off at the airport tomorrow, because I will have to attend a very important meeting. It doesn't matter, Mr.Lin. I can understand. I know you are always very busy. Work must come first.
local_seq: Thanks a lot. You have been here for almost three weeks. How time flies!

global_seq: Yes. And I would like to convey my thanks to you for your help during my stay here in Nanjing. It is our pleasure. It has been a great pleasure to work with you. Me too. I am looking forward to cooperating with you again. Really? Great! We will. Well, what's your flight number? When are you leaving tomorrow?
local_seq: It's Flight No. 104, Northey Airlines, which leaves at ten O'dock tomorrow evening.

global_seq: OK, I will send someone to see you off. That is so thoughtful of you. My pleasure. Take care and have a nice trip. Thanks a lot. My wife and I will be welcoming and looking forward to your visit.
local_seq: Let's call it a deal. Hope to see you again soon. Keep in touch then. Byebye.

global_seq: Francis, what’ s that? Well, that is the chart showing our company’ s organizational structure. Could you tell me something about it? Ok. On the top, Mr. Thomas, the managing director, is responsible for running the company.
local_seq: How many departments do we have?

global_seq: Are you being served, madam? No. Um, do you carry any padded coat? Yes, what size is in your mind? Small size.
local_seq: Any particular brand?

global_seq: Whatever. You know, I’ m thinking of a gift for my mother. It’ s her 60 birthday next Friday. Could you give me some advice? You are the expert. How about this one? It’ s the latest design, simple but elegant. Looks nice. How much do you charge? $ 100.
local_seq: That’ s sheer robbery. I’ m sure you can do better than that.

global_seq: Room service. May I come in? Come in please. Mr. Green? Yes. Put them on there please.
local_seq: OK.If you need anything, just call the Room service.

global_seq: Did you feed the puppies today? Yes, I have. That's good! Just make sure to bathe them later. No problem. I can do that for you.
local_seq: Thank you! You know they have to go to the vet on Saturday?

global_seq: We’ re trying to get donations. What are you getting donations for? We’ re getting donations for the campaigns. How much money are you looking to make?
local_seq: As much as we can.

global_seq: Are you doing different fundraisers? We’ re just going door to door. You should do something else. Do you have any suggestions?
local_seq: Try a car wash and selling candy.

global_seq: Hi, Juliet, I'm treating Mr.Li and his team members from Galp to dinner tomorrow evening.Where do you think I should take them? Well, Mr.Li has very good taste in wine, and Galp is one of the biggest clients. I suggest you take them to a decent French restaurant. Make sure you make a very good impression. That's a good idea. Which one do you recommend? The Pairszone? Or Lapis. They are both listed this year glory magazine for have most of frantic Fetch cuisine in town. But I heard Lapis has a better wine selection.
local_seq: We'll go to the place. Could you book a table for 4 at 7 PM?

global_seq: Good afternoon. May I help you? Yes, I’ m here to see Joanna Stevens. I have an appointment at four. Certainly, may I take your name? I’ ll let her know you’ Ve arrived. Sure, it’ s Josh O’ Neil.
local_seq: Ms. Stevens will be with you momentarily. Can I offer you something to drink?

global_seq: Have you any beef today? Yes, we've got a very tender new shipment from the mainland. It is a weekend special. How much is it a pound? One pound and fifty pence a pound.
local_seq: Good. I'll get three pounds of it.

global_seq: I need a suggestion for a restaurant here in Manhattan. Certainly! How much are you planning to spend on dinner, sir? My date's very sophisticated, so I'm sure she would expect nothing but the best. May I suggest our own hotel restaurant? It got three stars in the latest restaurant review.
local_seq: No, thank you, I want to go out on the town. What other ideas do you have?

global_seq: Hello, is this apartment management? Can I help you? Yes, this is the tenant of apartment ten. I guess my kitchen sink is clogging up again, and so is the bathtub. Alright. I'll send someone over tomorrow.
local_seq: Um, I'd really appreciate it if you send someone over to fix it today. It's really a bother. I can't cook or take a shower.

global_seq: Good morning, Madam, can I take your order now? Yes, I'd like to have a roast chicken leg. Anything else? No.
local_seq: How about drink?

global_seq: No, enough. Please wait a moment. Waiter, come back. OK. What's up, Madam?
local_seq: It's not too salty.

global_seq: OK. Waiter, come back again. Yes, anything wrong? Not too rare.
local_seq: Yes, I see.

global_seq: Why do you come back again? There's a question I want to ask you. What's that? Which leg do you want to have, right leg or left one?
local_seq: Thanks, thanks a lot and thanks a million.

global_seq: What are the requirements to apply for the position? Your major must be computer. Do you think my educational background suits this position? Yes, I’ m quite satisfied with your qualifications.
local_seq: Does this job require that new employees take any kind of training course?

global_seq: Good evening, sir, and welcome to Chez Attitude. We have a dinner reservation for four at 7:00 under the name of Foster. Yes, Mr. Foster, if you would please be seated over in the waiting area, our hostess will be with you in a moment. Thank you. Would it be OK if we have a cocktail while we are waiting?
local_seq: Of course, I will tell her.

global_seq: I would really prefer an outside table. Would that be possible? Sure, if you would like one of those tables, I could seat you right away. Sure, that would be great! Thank you! Here are your menus and the wine menu, and would you like to order your drinks now?
local_seq: Yes, I would like a vodka gimlet, please.

global_seq: Mr. Smith, I would like to get right to the point here. First, we need to talk about how much each company will pay. Well, we want to have the largest share. Our company is much larger than yours, and we have been in business longer. Let's look at that another way. The major point is the value that we add, not who has been in business longer, or is bigger. What are you thinking about?
local_seq: We do not want to place ourselves in an inferior position. We are a good, small company---that's why you are interested.

global_seq: Are you planning on voting? Yes. What about you? Yes, but this will be my first time voting. Really?
local_seq: Yes, and I have no idea how to do it.

global_seq: Voting is simple. I don’ t know any of the laws they’ re trying to pass. That’ s okay. They describe everything on the ballot. I didn’ t know that.
local_seq: Don’ t worry. You’ ll be fine.

global_seq: May I please speak to Tom? Tom has gone to lunch. I'll just try him again. Do you want me to have him give you a call?
local_seq: No, but what time do you expect him back?

global_seq: What in the world is that smell? The aroma of roasting coffee beans. Smells like you're baking something. What are those? Green beans. They pop and turn brown when you roast them.
local_seq: Cool! But isn't that a hot air popcorn popper?

global_seq: Bob, did you see our supervisor? I need him to sign this paper. He is in his office, but you'd better choose your words carefully while talking to him. What's up? Nothing. But he is in a bad mood today.
local_seq: Thanks for the warning.

global_seq: I love breathing fresh air in the suburb places, while sitting in the morning sunshine. I can't agree more, honey. We need to get away from work from time to time. Yeah, just return to nature and feel the thrills of its beauty. We are nor alone here. So many other families!
local_seq: Sure. The sunny days of spring are ideal for outdoor gatherings.

global_seq: Well, let's go over there and put a blanket on the lawn. OK, you go back to our car and fetch the picnic stuff. Oh, so heavy! What have you put in here? Nothing special. Food, drinks, and Daniel's kangaroo toys.
local_seq: Toys? Why do we need toys for a picnic?

global_seq: He said he would like to be our tour director and he lined up many things to do. Sure, then. May it really be a day of enjoyment. Other than that, we can also teach him something about science. Science? What are you talking about? Forget about your science, OK? It's a picnic! I mean we can inspire him for a deeper understanding of the natural world.
local_seq: I can't agree on that. Just cut it out. Give him a break and don't spoil the day.

global_seq: Hey, Robert, that's a nice shirt you are wearing. Where did you get it? Thanks, I like it too. I bought it at the nearby department store. That's nice. Do you know you can get one at the wholesale market near the zoo for a much lower price? Yeah, I know that. But at those places. the prices they ask you are ridiculously high, and if you don't bargain hard, you will get ripped-off.
local_seq: True, learning how to haggle the price is one of the things people have to pick up when they come to China for the first time.

global_seq: Hello, I'm returning your phone call. I'm glad that you could get back to me so fast. No problem, but what were you calling about? I needed to talk to you about your son.
local_seq: Is he messing up in school?

global_seq: He was acting up in class one day last week. What was he doing? He wouldn't stop talking throughout the class. I don't know what's gotten into him.
local_seq: If you could, would you please talk to him?

global_seq: Are you from America? No. I am Canadian. Are you Chinese? Yes. Nice to meet you! Nice to meet you, too. Let me show you around.
local_seq: Thanks, I will appreciate it. How long have you been here?

global_seq: Hi. I'm looking for some good deals on produce. You might want to try the mangoes. Can you describe a mango to me? It's a fruit a little smaller than a grapefruit. It has a big seed in it.
local_seq: Do I eat the seed?

global_seq: Maybe some animals eat the seed, but humans don't. You'd have to soak it for 10 years. What's the price of these mangoes? Today you get a 50 - percent discount. They're only $ 1 each. Tell me what they taste like.
local_seq: Their flesh is soft and juicy. It has a citrus taste. It's sweet.

global_seq: Hello, can I speak to Alice, please? Hold on, please. Thank you. Sorry, but she’ s out.
local_seq: Could you tell her Tom Green called?

global_seq: Well, let's have your firm order. Yes, here is our offer, 30,000 skirts at 200 yuan per skirt, FOB New York. You will find our price comes in line with the prevailing market. Your price is rather high. We cannot accept it. Can you bring the price down a little? In fact, if it weren't for our good relations, we wouldn't consider making you a firm order at this price.
local_seq: I can't agree with you. We have quotation from other sources too. Their prices are lower than yours.

global_seq: Are you still coming to my place for dinner tomorrow night? Of course. Is the dinner still on? Yes, I was just wondering how you and your roommate were planning on coming to my place. We were planning on walking both ways since the weather is still nice.
local_seq: That's what I thought you would do. Listen, I live in a bit of a rough neighborhood. It's just down the street from all the bars. You probably don't want to be walking around after dark.

global_seq: It can't be that bad. I wish it wasn't, but there is actually a lot of crime and prostitution around here. Really? I never would have guessed. The criminals must only come out in the evenings, because I've never noticed anything strange when I've been at your house in the daytime. Do me a favor, and take a taxi. It'd make me feel a lot better.
local_seq: Ok, we will. How do you get around in the evenings?

global_seq: Dad, I've finished my homework. Well, what game do you want to play? Do you want to play poker? Do you know how to play it?
local_seq: I'll teach you.

global_seq: Well, Betty. Since you’ Ve done well during the probation period, we decided to employ you formally. And now we need to sign the formal agreement. Thank you very much, Mr. Smith. I am very happy that I’ ll be a member of your team. May I see the agreement first? Of course. If you have any questions, just bring them out. OK, thank you. Well, I find that the salary level in this agreement is not like what you have said in the interview. Can you give me some explanations?
local_seq: Well, it’ s like this, during your first year, you will enjoy this salary level, a year later, we’ ll increase your salary by 20 %.

global_seq: Can we add up this item to the agreement? Yes, maybe the personnel department made some mistakes in making the agreement. Do you have any other questions? No, thank you. Shall we sign the agreement now? Yes, welcome to our company. I hope we can cooperate happily.
local_seq: Thank you. I'll work hard.

global_seq: I’ d like to open a current account. Certainly. May I see your social security and your ID Please. Here your are. I wonder how much interest can I earn for my current account. Oh. Current account don’ t pay our interest.
local_seq: Why is that?

global_seq: Hello, Shogun Restaurant. Hi, I would like to make a dinner reservation. Of course, what evening will you be joining us on? We will need the reservation for Tuesday night.
local_seq: What time would you like the reservation for?

global_seq: We would prefer 7 For how many people There will be 4 of us. Fine, I can seat you at 7
local_seq: Thank you. The last name is Foster.

global_seq: Good afternoon. What can I help you with today? I have a Time Deposit here and I'd like to get the money now. The maturity date isn't for another 10 weeks. Are you aware of that? Yes, I know, but I need the money urgently for a family emergency, you see. I know I should apply in writing if I wish to withdraw, but I'm afraid there just isn't time.
local_seq: The regulations state that the interest is paid at the rate of a Current Deposit, so unfortunately you will lose some interest.

global_seq: May I take your order now? Yes, I'll have a boiled egg with toast and orange juice, please. How would you like your eggs? Hard-boiled, please.
local_seq: And your toast, light or dark?

global_seq: Dark, please. Now or later? Later will do. Will there be anything else?
local_seq: No, that's all. Thanks.

global_seq: What else should we do now after the floors are done and after the furniture is in? We need to redo the curtains and paint all the walls and ceilings. I'm the painter. You can be in charge of going to curtain shops to choose curtains. That will probably be pretty expensive too. Having good curtains made isn't cheap. You mean we can't just buy curtains already made?
local_seq: Absolutely not. The windows must be measured, and then the curtains need to be made professionally. So that will take a while. Maybe a month or so.

global_seq: While the curtains are being made, I can start having people look at the kitchen. I can't stand that old kitchen. I won't be able to cook there. I don't want to use that electric stove. We need to find an interior decorating company to redecorate the kitchen. I believe in Portland there are shops that specialize in kitchen renovation. I will look in the Yellow Pages. I'd like a kitchen mostly in ivory and light green. I agree. The colors must be soft and pleasant. You should feel comfortable when you cook our dinners. Me? Cook our dinners? Hah! You will be cooking, dear. You will cook.
local_seq: No, I don't think so. I'll be too busy having tea in our new tea room.

global_seq: Speed Airlines Reservation. May I help you? Yes. Do you have any flight to Paris on 15th? I want one leaving in the afternoon. Yes. Flight DP336 leaves at 15:16. Is that all right? Is it a direct flight?
local_seq: No, Sir.It has an hour layover in London.

global_seq: I feel like to wear my hair in this way. Oh, it's really popular these days. Do you think it's suitable for me? Honestly speaking, I think the one next to it suits you better.
local_seq: Even though I really like it, it's just too modern for me.

global_seq: That's not true. Look over there! That lady chose the same one and she is surely older than you. Okay then. And I also want to have my hair colored. Which color do you like? Claret-red.
local_seq: Nice choice.

global_seq: Can you believe that Obama is our new President? I’ m so happy about that. Did you vote for him? I sure did. How about you?
local_seq: I voted for him.

global_seq: I have complete confidence in our new President. Is that right? I know he will help change America. I hope so, because America needs a change.
local_seq: I feel like things are already changing, because he was elected.

global_seq: Good morning, Textile Import & Export Company. Hello, this is Miller. I'm calling about the appointment with Mr. Zhang for this afternoon. Something's just come up, I'm afraid the appointment will have to be rescheduled, I'm very sorry about the change. That's all right. Maybe we can make another arrangement. You're very kind to say so. Thank you. Do you think tomorrow morning would suit him?
local_seq: I'm afraid there's a bit of a problem. In fact, he's booked up the whole week except tomorrow afternoon.

global_seq: Tomorrow afternoon, Um... you see, I've made an appointment with Mr. Comet for tomorrow afternoon. In order to meet Mr. Zhang, I have to cancel the appointment with Mr. Comet, I'm afraid. I'm terribly sorry, Mr Miller, but Mr. Zhang is really busy this week. I understand. When do you think I can come and see him tomorrow afternoon? Please let me check. Tomorrow afternoon - Yes, he'll be free from 2:00 tomorrow afternoon. Do you think it's convenient for you?
local_seq: Yes, that's quite all right for me.

global_seq: What'll it be today, sir? Fill it up. Super Unleaded. Shall we check your oil and tires? I just checked the oil myself, but you can check the tires.
local_seq: ( The attendants fill the tank, clean the windscreen, and add some air to the tires. ) All right, sir, that'll be $ 26.50.

global_seq: Northwest Airline. Hello, I'd like to reconfirm my flight. May I have your flight No., PLS? My flight No. is 102 leaving Baiyun Airport at fourteen twenty.
local_seq: Yes, that's our regular flight to Shanghai. What's your name, PLS?

global_seq: I am Jason Armstrong. My first initial is J. One minute. Oh, yes, here we are. You are flying economy class, aren’ t you? Yes, that's right. Okay, you are all set, Mr. Armstrong. Enjoy your flight!
local_seq: Thanks!

global_seq: Excuse me, I want to go to Galion by ship. Is there a ship to Dalian? Yes, there is. There is only one ship there every day. What time does it leave? It leaves at 9:30 a. m..
local_seq: Could you please tell me about the cabins?

global_seq: I think I need some iced water, too. Is there an extra charge for that? Yes. We charge 50 cents for iced water. That's fine. Could you give me some more napkins, too? Sure. Do you need anything else?
local_seq: Yes. I would also like some sweet-and-sour sauce and pepper.

global_seq: May I help you, sir? Yes, I have many things to buy. I would like to choose the cleaning milk first. All right. What is your type of skin? Dry. That's my problem.
local_seq: You can use this. It has special effect for keeping your face moisturized. It has this lotion, as a gift attached.

global_seq: Sounds good. What about shampoo? I would like to buy the product that prevents scurf. How about this one? It is well-known for the effect of removing scurf. Is it a newcomer? Yes, it is a new brand.
local_seq: I do not care the brand as long as it works well.

global_seq: Can I take your order? I'll take two value meals. What kind of drink do you want with those meals? One Coca Cola and the other a Sprite, please.
local_seq: You can super-size your meals for only three dollars extra.

global_seq: Do you have any work experience in this field? Yes. After my graduation from university, I worked as a Customer Service Coordinator in a foreign representative office, and then I transferred to a joint venture as a Market Development Manager. So I am familiar with the market in China. What have you learned from the jobs you have had? I learned to be patient when dealing with customers complaints and try my best to solve them. In addition, I learned at my previous jobs how to cooperate with my colleagues.
local_seq: Does your current employer know you are looking for another job?

global_seq: No, I haven't discussed my leaving plans with my current employer, but I am sure he will release me. What is your impression of your present company? Very good. What would your current colleague say about you?
local_seq: They would say I'm a dependable and hard worker.

global_seq: Open you suitcase, please. OK.Here you are. Do you have anything to declare? No, I don't.
local_seq: Any cigarette, liquor?

global_seq: Yes, I have two cartons of cigarettes, one bottle of whisky. What's this white powder? Are they drugs? No, this is the medicine for the stomach. May I open one of these? Let me taste it.
local_seq: Yes, sir.Go ahead.Here you are.

global_seq: Look, Jim. That man just fell down over there. We better see if he’ s o. k. Sir... sir? Are you all right? Sir? He’ s not answering. You’ d better check his pulse and breathing.
local_seq: Oh, no. He’ s not breathing, and there’ s no pulse. Call 911.

global_seq: I would like to make an appointment for a project meeting. Of course, I have Monday or Tuesday available. What day would be best for you? I would like to meet on Monday. Very well then. Are mornings or afternoons best?
local_seq: I want to come in the morning.

global_seq: I will have my assistant check my calendar and get back to you with the exact time. Can you bring me an outline of the project when you come? Yes, I can bring the outline when I come to the meeting. Do you think that we should include the entire committee in the meeting or just our sub-committee? I think that we should have just the sub-committee.
local_seq: OK then, I will make the arrangements for them to attend. Do you know how to get there?

global_seq: Hi, John. What brings you to town? Hi, Mary. Lily wanted me to buy her some things for the party. What do you think of the traffic today? It’ s pretty bad.
local_seq: Yeah. You can say that again. It’ s noisy too.

global_seq: How do I use the powder? Please dissolve the powder in hot water. Soak your hand or foot in it for 20 minutes twice a day. How do I use the eye-drop and ointment? Put the eye-drop into your right eye 4 - - 6 times a day, 1 - - 2 drops each time. Squeeze a bit of the ointment on your eyelid every night.
local_seq: Well, I see. Thanks.

global_seq: Housekeeping, may I come in? Come in please. Good coming, sir. May I do your room now? How long will it take?
local_seq: Your room will be ready in half an hour.

global_seq: You look upset, is there anything wrong? Yes, to tell you the truth, there is. What is it? Well, I've lost my wallet and my ID card.
local_seq: Oh, that's too bad! I am sorry to hear that!

global_seq: What's the matter with my wife? She had a sudden heart attack. I guess so. It was very terrible when she was at the onset of the illness. I am worried that I would lose her. Don’ t worry. She is much better now. But you are not permitted to disturb her at the moment.
local_seq: I know. But is she out of danger now?

global_seq: How large is the plant? It covers an area of 75,000 square meters. It’ s much larger than I expected. When was the plant set up? In the early 70s. We’ ll soon be celebrating the 30th anniversary.
local_seq: Congratulations!

global_seq: Thank you. How many employees do you have in this plant? 500. We’ re running on three shifts. Does the plant work with everything from the raw material to the finished product?
local_seq: Our associates specializing in these fields make some access - ries. Well, here we’ re at the production shop. Shall we start with the assembly line?

global_seq: Can you tell me the results of my home inspection? Before I answer that, I want to make sure that you know what I was looking for. Are you clear on what I was looking for? I never had a home inspection before. I inspect the home for problems that might not be all that apparent in a quick walk-through.
local_seq: I asked the owners, and they said that everything was great with the house.

global_seq: The owners might not be aware of everything wrong with the house. Some things are hidden, but might still be a problem for you in the future. I heard that the owners must fix all of the problems before the escrow closes. I inform you of the problems. If there are major problems, you can decline to buy the house or they may wish to fix any problems. What kinds of things did you discover in my home inspection?
local_seq: I found some fairly major problems. A major support beam in the roof is broken, and the shower floor leaked and rotted out the second-floor joist.

global_seq: Hi, Mark! Hi, do you have a minute? Oh, I'm sorry, Nigel. I'm rushing to a meet right now. Sure, no problem. Can we fix a time to talk later? Sure, but this week is crazy for me. Can we make it next Monday?
local_seq: Ok, see you 10 o'clock next Monday!

global_seq: Jack, you should have known in general the situation of our company now. Yes, and I am very satisfied with it. Do you have any other questions? Would you please tell me about fringe benefits of the company?
local_seq: OK, we will pay insurances for employees after the probationary period.

global_seq: What do they include? Include endowment insurance, medical insurance, unemployment insurance, work-related injury insurance and maternity insurance. That sounds great. Employees will also have housing payment reserve funds.
local_seq: The fringe benefits in your company are excellent, and it's generous of you to offer five insurances and one fund

global_seq: Hey, daughter. Let me ask you something. Yes, Dad? Do you have life insurance? Well, no. It just seemed like another bill we’ d have to pay.
local_seq: You have children now. What if something, god forbid, happens to you?

global_seq: Do you have any special skills? I can write computer programs, I have a good command of secretarial skills. What qualifications have you got? I have a doctor license and a driving license.
local_seq: Do you get special training in office skills?

global_seq: Can I help you? Yes, I'm looking for a house. To buy or to rent? Oh, to rent.
local_seq: How much do you want to pay?

global_seq: About 300 a month. Well, I've got one here. It's 260 a month. How big is it? It's got a kitchen, a bathroom, and one bedroom.
local_seq: Well, actually I prefer something a bit bigger if that's possible.

global_seq: Yes, I think so. There is also an interesting one.It ' s opposite the park. How much is it? It's 325 a month. It's the biggest we've got in this area. What's it like?
local_seq: Well, There're two bedrooms, a sitting room, a kitchen and a bathroom.

global_seq: I may go grocery shopping later. We need to get food? I don't think we have any food. What are you going to buy?
local_seq: What food are we out of?

global_seq: Go and look in the kitchen. Could you look for me? You should just get the basics. What would that be?
local_seq: Get some eggs, milk, and bread.

global_seq: In case you didn't know, I'm checking out in half an hour. That won't be a problem, sir. That's good to hear. Now there's still a whole New York day ahead of me. You're right, sir. Your whole day is still ahead of you.
local_seq: I still have time to explore more of New York, but I need a place to secure my baggage.

global_seq: We have a storage place here, but you have to leave a deposit. A deposit, huh? I would think my baggage would be enough of a deposit. Just present your VISA card, and there won't be any problems. That deposit bothers me. Give me a minute.
local_seq: Okay, sir, but remember how close it is to your checkout time.

global_seq: Good morning, is this Ryan? You are speaking with Ryan. How can I help you? Ryan, this is Malia, and I need to call in sick today. What seems to be the problem?
local_seq: I went hiking and have terrible poison oak.

global_seq: When did you get that? I think I got it on Saturday, but it just showed up today. What are you doing for it? The doctor prescribed an ointment and gave me a shot.
local_seq: Good. You probably should be much better by tomorrow.

global_seq: Good morning, I am Monica. Are you Mr. White, the manager of finance department? I am the newcomer and also working in the finance department. Yes, that is me. Nice to meet you, Monica. Welcome on board! Thank you. I am very happy to have my own office now. I’ Ve never had one before. It is very nice. Well, we have nicer things than that in this company. You will find out soon.
local_seq: Really? What could that be?

global_seq: Do you need help with something? I need help finding a new refrigerator. Do you see anything that you like? That Kenmore looks nice.
local_seq: That is a wonderful choice.

global_seq: What makes is so great? It's very inexpensive, and it has all the appliances. What appliances are you talking about? The fridge and freezer is very spacious, and it also has an ice maker and water dispenser.
local_seq: May I take a look inside?

global_seq: Are you going somewhere? I’ m on my way to work. Where do you work? I work at the polling place.
local_seq: You didn’ t tell me you were working there this year.

global_seq: I do this every year. How’ d you get that job? I applied online. That’ s interesting.
local_seq: I enjoy working there every year.

global_seq: I was anxious to find out what the sellers had to say about my counter-offer. I was able to contact them so, if you’ ll step into my office, we’ ll talk. Did they go with the proposed counter-offer? They want you to pick up the cost of the home inspection, but they accepted your offer.
local_seq: Is a home inspection very expensive?

global_seq: It can cost between five hundred and one thousand dollars. Do I get to choose who inspects the home? Yes, you get to choose. I would spend a little more to get a really thorough inspection. Can you call the owners with my acceptance right away?
local_seq: I am going to contact the sellers immediately. They were looking forward to your acceptance.

global_seq: Excuse me, madam. May I see your ticket, please? I'm afraid I have lost my ticket. Can I buy one again? Where are you going? I'm going to Nanchang.
local_seq: Where did you begin your journey?

global_seq: At Huangshan. OK. Here you are. And by the way, what time shall we get to Nanchang? We'll get there around 7:45 in the morning.
local_seq: Thanks.

global_seq: Do you have some good ideas of losing weight? First of all, you should pay attention to what you eat. Don't eat too much food with high calories, such as chocolate, ice cream and the like. Any more? Stay away from fried foods. Fried foods are fried in oil or fat.
local_seq: Got it.

global_seq: What can I do for you, Miss? I want to buy a bottle of perfume for myself. Well, here is a perfume kind for women. I don't like strong perfumes.
local_seq: How about this Isawell's flowery perfume?

global_seq: I don't think it smells nice. Do you have green tea perfume? Yes, here you are. May I have a look at this?
local_seq: Sure. The bittersweet perfume has a calming effect on the nerves.

global_seq: Excuse me. May I see that laptop for a moment? Sure. You mean this one? No, the one on the left. Yes, that ′ s the one.... Thank you. It ′ s a state-of-the-art piece of equipment, sir. With a gigantic 16.1 USGA TFT screen, 2.8 Ghz mobile processor, generous 512 MB RAM, removable 80 GB hard drive, convenient CD-RW / DVD combo drive, stunning fast graphics board with 64 MB DDR DRAM, dual battery capability, integrated Fast Ethernet card, IEEE 1394 digital interface and eight USB ports, it has all the power of a desktop computer packed into an ultra-slim notebook!
local_seq: That ′ s impressive! What ′ s the sale price?

global_seq: I bought it. I got a watch, too. The company that sells this car has a car club. Where you can buy lots of paraphernalia? Yeah, and meet other drivers of the same car! Cool!
local_seq: I know girls love this kind of car. Look, it's got a sunroof! Imagine... a cool, starry night...

global_seq: Peter, I hope you will accept my quotation for the air freshener. I wish I could place a monthly order for a minimum of 50 cases, introducing your goods to my customers, but your price, $ 100 for a case, is too high in this highly competitive market. I have cut the price the minimum. You know our freshener is a patent product, different from other kinds of fresheners. We could not have quitted it at such a low price if it were not for your past large orders. This price, actually, leaves us with a very small profit. People here desire medium-priced air freshener only. Please carefully consider my proposal, which will lead to a larger business between us.
local_seq: The low price I'm offering you is as low as I can go.

global_seq: What did you say? I said it’ s a lovely day. Why don't we go for a walk? Well, I feel a little tired. Come on! Rest breads rust.
local_seq: Then can you wait a few minutes? I want to finish writing this letter.

global_seq: Hello, may I speak to Mr.Baker, please? Hold on a second, please. I'll see if he's in. I'm sorry, Mr.Baker had just gone out. Who's calling? This is Jones. Can I leave a message? Yes, certainly. What's that?
local_seq: Please tell him to call Mr.Baker at the Grand Restaurant. It's urgent.

global_seq: Good morning. I’ m thinking about buying some new furniture for my living room. Could you help me? Certainly. As you can see, we have several three-piece suites on sale. Feel free to sit down and test how comfortable they are. I came to your store yesterday and have come back today to make a final decision. I think I like the black leather suite. It's on sale, isn't it. Yes. The price has been reduced by 50 %. It’ s a real bargain.
local_seq: I’ ll take it. I also need to improve the lighting in my living room. Do you have any suggestions?

global_seq: Steven, it's ten o'clock. I'm going to bed. I'm beat. Okay. I'm going to stay up a while. I've got to go over the household budget. We've sightly overspent this month. Oh, can't you do it tomorrow? It's already past 10. But I'm not sleepy, darling. I want to finish it today.
local_seq: Okay. Please close the door to the basement before you go to bed. I don't want the dog down there tonight.

global_seq: A friend told me I might find a room here. Yes. I'll have a room free next week. What do you charge? 12,000 a year, but you can't get visitors to live in.
local_seq: OK. Would it be all right to look at the room first?

global_seq: Well, we've settled the problems of price, quality and quantity. What mode of payment do you wish to employ? Irrevocable letter of credit, of course. It's the normal terms of payment in international business. Could you adopt D / A or D / P? You see I have to pay a deposit when I open a letter of credit. That will tie up my funds and add to the cost of my imports, especially for such a huge order. You might consult your bank and see if you could reduce the required deposit to a minimum.
local_seq: Anyhow, there would be certain bank charges. We've done business for years and you should have some faith in our credit. It would help me greatly, if you could accept D / A or D / P. It makes no difference to you, but it does to me.

global_seq: Hi, I’ m Mary Smith. Hello, I’ m the landlord. John Taylor. Nice to meet you Mr. Taylor. Please, call me John.
local_seq: O. K., John. Well, can I have a look at the place?

global_seq: Sure. Come on it. We just finished rebuilding everything. Oh, it hasn’ t been painted yet. No, we’ re going to get that done next week. Well. It’ s certainly nice. You’ Ve done a great job.
local_seq: Thank you.

global_seq: The rent is $ 600 a month? That’ s right. Well, I think I’ ll take it. Can I write you a check for the security deposit now? $ 1200? Yeah. But why don’ t you come by your office tomorrow to sign the lease?
local_seq: That would be fine.

global_seq: Excuse me. Yes, sir. Can I help you? Um, this steak, I asked for to be medium rare. Medium rare, that’ s right, sir. I remember your order.
local_seq: Well, I’ m afraid it isn’ t. It’ s a bit too well done and rather tough. Would you mind changing?

global_seq: Good morning, I am Monica. Are you Mr. White, the manager of finance department? I am the newcomer and also working in the finance department. Yes, that is me. Nice to meet you, Monica. Welcome on board! Thank you. I am very happy to have my own office now. I’ Ve never had one before. It is very nice. Well, we have nicer things than that in this company. You will find out soon.
local_seq: Really? What could that be?

global_seq: What kind of document is an invoice? It's a document from the seller to the buyer. It contains full particulars of the goods sold, such as quantity, quality, price, forwarding particulars, and terms of payment. How many kinds of foreign invoices are there? Four. They are Loco invoice, FOB invoice, CIF invoice and Franco invoice.
local_seq: What does the price in different kinds of invoices include?

global_seq: I'd like to buy one of these refrigerators. Do I have to pay in cash? No, we have an easy-payment plan. One-third down, and the balance in six months. Fine. Will you work out the details, please? Certainly. Would you sit here please? I'll call our credit manager.
local_seq: Thank you.

global_seq: It's just a formality, but for hire purchase we usually require references. What kind of references do you need? Perhaps your employer could supply us with one. I'm sure he could, but I prefer not to bother him. Would my bank do?
local_seq: Certainly. A simple letter from your bank would be quite satisfactory.

global_seq: Good afternoon, Pan Am. May I help you? Yes. I'd like to make a reservation to New York for 18th next month. Please wait a moment. Let me check for you.The flight is FW 711 and it arrives at 10:00 am. How long is that journey?
local_seq: 14 hours.

global_seq: Are you being served, madam? Not yet. Sit here please.How would you like your hair done? A trim and perm.
local_seq: Do you want a cold-wave or perm?

global_seq: Hello, and welcome to IBA. Which service do you require? Hello, Shelly, is it? I'm here on behalf of my company, so I'll need the Corporate Banking Services. That's no problem ; I can take care of that for you. I need to have a credit check done for my company.
local_seq: If it's this kind of consultancy service, I'll have to direct you to another department, I'm afraid.

First cover your left eye like this, and when I point, please read the chart from the top, and go as far as you can telling me which way the “ E ” points.

local_seq: I don’ t see any wrinkles or sagging skin! You are 25, stop being ridiculous. Besides, I think that people who get Boto, have facelifts, or tummy tucks look weird. It doesn’ t look natural.

You look amazing. I thought you were my friend and would support me on this! I just want to feel better about myself and feel more attractive. You don’ t need plastic surgery to do that. You are fine the way you are and you have guys drooling all over you! Plus, plastic surgery hurts!

global_seq: So how's everything going for Christmas? I've got all the presents I need, and my family is working together to get all the food ready. That's easy, but I have another problem to deal with. What's that? Don't tell me you've still got Christmas cards to write, it usually takes my wife a month to write all of ours. No, I did that a long time ago. It's about telling my son the truth about Santa Claus.
local_seq: He still doesn't know that Santa isn't real? How old is he, eight?

global_seq: Yes. He's never said anything so I never told him. But now that he's getting older... You think it's better that he should be told? Yes, he's too old to believe in that type of things. And I'd rather tell him before the kids at school do. That happened to my oldest girl. She became really upset when her classmates told her Santa wasn't real.
local_seq: I can understand. I was lucky with my oldest, she figured it out by herself and didn't tell my son.

global_seq: Hello, this is 5735647 5. Hello, this is John. I wanna speak to Linda, please. This is Linda. Hi, Linda. I want to invite you to a dinner tomorrow evening.

global_seq: At seven thirty pm, Longing Chinese restaurant.And I'll go to your home and pick you up at 7. Ok, I'll wait for you at 7pm at home. Anything else? No, have a nice day! Thank you. Bye.

global_seq: What’ s the matter, dear? Something awful happened. We went to the Portobello Road, and someone stole my handbag. Oh, dear. Did you lose a lot of money? No. Only a few pounds. But my passport was in the bag. That’ what I’ m really worry about.

global_seq: Hello, May I help you? Yes, we're interested in seeing the rooms for rent. Oh, how nice! there are bright rooms and the house is very quiet. That is exactly what we're looking for.

global_seq: That sounds all right to us. When do you want to move in? How about tomorrow afternoon? Fine, I'll be expecting you.

global_seq: Mon and I got in another fight, Boris. oh, Iris! what was it about this time? it was over food. I simply wanted some fried chicken but she said no. I believe she was right. You must know that fried foods contain a lot of fat.
local_seq: oh, she keeps saying that. She never allows me to have them.

global_seq: I think you'd better take her advice since health is the greatest wealth. But, Boris, i am not a baby any more. well, that's true. how about your mother?
local_seq: she also believes in healthy diet. And she requires us to have regular meals.

global_seq: poor you. It seems we are in the same boat. Oh, i am grateful for my mother on this point. her idea of healthy eating helps me a lot keeping fit. really? so you don't have fried food at all. not really. I may have some occasionally for a chance. But I don't indulge myself too much.
local_seq: how do you manage it?

global_seq: I think this spring is a good time for us to start looking. We should plan to move out of here before July. I'm tired of living in apartments. I know, dear. I am too. But we've just been too busy to look for a house. We need to find a good realtor.
local_seq: Not necessary. If we use a realtor to find a house, it will be more expensive.

global_seq: What do you mean? Realtors always get a commission. If the realtor helps us find something, we have to pay him. But doesn't a realtor help with the contract? I thought they take care of all the legal troubles. Yes, that's often true. But you have to pay them.
local_seq: I still think we should have a realtor. We're new in this country. We don't know all the laws of buying a house. And also, the realtor will inspect the house. He can tell us if the house has any problems.

global_seq: Of course we need a house inspector. But we can hire an inspector on our own. As for the legal problems, I have friends. They can help us. So how can we find a house if we don't have a realtor? It takes a little more time. We have to check the ads in the paper. Probably also there are special real estate magazines with ads. Then we have to drive to the homes and look at them. And doesn't the person selling the house have a realtor?
local_seq: Sometimes they do, sometimes they don't. It's best to find someone who is selling by themselves.

global_seq: Why? That is because if the seller has a realtor, their price will be higher. He will have to pay a commission to the realtor. Hmm. It all sounds very complicated. It is. But buying a house is very important. So it takes time. That's why we haven't done it yet. It's very troublesome.
local_seq: I want to look in the papers today. Maybe we can see something we like.

global_seq: So, got any more ideas for the website? Well, since we're collecting gifts instead of red envelopes, I made a " for guests only " gift chat room. But we registered at Macy's. People can just buy gifts there. The Taiwanese won't have time to buy gifts in America. The chat room is more convenient.
local_seq: You're right. They can discuss what to get and avoid buying the same things.

global_seq: Or discuss what gifts they could buy together. Any other ideas? We can also put a guest book on the website for people to sign and write comments. And we were going to make a collage for each of us using our baby pictures...
local_seq: Yeah, that will be the best part. Jack hasn't seen yours yet, right?

global_seq: I have a taste for something sweet. What are you thinking? I want some kind of dessert. Well, what kind of dessert do you want?
local_seq: I was thinking about ordering some kind of pie.

global_seq: Do you know what kind you want? I honestly don't know. Did you want to know my favorite kind of pie? What's your favorite kind?
local_seq: My absolutely favorite kind of pie is apple.

global_seq: Hi, Cole. What can I do for you? if you have a few minutes, I'd like to talk to you about my future at this company. sure, have a seat. thanks.
