local_seq: I think that we should let someone know. They will probably want to fix the problem.

global_seq: I'm going to have to do some shopping today. Oh yeah? What do you need to go shopping for? I want to find a new bedroom set. Do you know where you're going to find your bedroom set?
local_seq: I have no clue.

global_seq: There's no particular place that you want to look at? I don't know where to go to find a nice bedroom set. I can tell you where I got mine, if you'd like. Please do.
local_seq: I bought mine from IKEA.

global_seq: Welcome to the KFC Just-in-Time. Can I help you? I want a Special King size and some chips. Anything else, sir? Green salad please.
local_seq: What do you want for your drink?

global_seq: Cola, please. Your address, please. ... Ok. got it.That ' ll be $ 6.50. Thank you for your order.it will be there in 20 minutes.
local_seq: Thank you.

global_seq: What fruits are in season right now? What about grapes and water melons? Can I sample a grape? Sure.
local_seq: It tastes good. How much are the grapes per kilo?

global_seq: I want to buy a shirt. What color do you like? A white one, please. Maybe you could have a look at this one.
local_seq: What's the size?

global_seq: Room service. Can I help you? This is room 1019. I would like to order breakfast. What would you like, sir? One orange juice, scrambled eggs with bacon, toast and coffee.
local_seq: It will take about 20 minutes, sir. Is that all right?

global_seq: How much does it cost to rent a mid-size car? I can give you one for $ 30 a day or $ 200 a week. Fine. I'd like to reserve one for next Tuesday. May I see your driver's license?
local_seq: Yes. It's right here.

global_seq: Excuse me. Do you mind if I ask some things about work for this company? Not at all. Go ahead. I've heard that the company is very strict with its staff.Is that true? Not really, so long as you follow all the regulations.
local_seq: If you make mistakes in your job, you'll be fired. Is that right?

global_seq: Hi, did you call for an exterminator? Yes! Thank goodness you’ re here.These bugs are driving us crazy! What sort of pest are we dealing with? We just bought this house and it is infected with just about everything. We have termites in the wood, cockroaches all over the place, and last night I saw a huge rat out in the backyard!
local_seq: Well, there’ s nothing we can’ t handle. I’ ll spray the floorboards and walls to get rid of the cockroaches, but the termites will be harder to get rid of. We will have to cover the entire house and fumigate it. Unfortunately that means you will have to find a place to stay for the next three days.

global_seq: John, it’ s time to get up. It can’ t be time to get up yet. It is. Hurry up! You’ ll be late for school. What’ s the time?
local_seq: It’ s nearly half past seven.

global_seq: My watch says ten past. It’ s slow. Hurry up! The bus goes at twenty to eight. Are you sure half past seven? Positive. I’ ll put the radio on.
local_seq: It’ s only seven o’ clock. Your watch is fast.

global_seq: Are you sure this is the right restaurant? Positive. You don't think you could be wrong? I'm absolutely sure I'm right.
local_seq: I don't know. It looks a little wrong down.

global_seq: Good morning, Oriental Electric Limited. Hello, this is Catherine. I am calling about the appointment with Mr. Liu for this afternoon. Something has just come up. I am afraid the appointment will have to be rescheduled. I am very sorry about the change. That is all right. Maybe we can make another arrangement. You are very kind to say so. Thank you. Do you think tomorrow morning would suit him?
local_seq: I'm afraid there is a bit of a problem. in fact, he has booked up the whole week except tomorrow afternoon.

global_seq: Tomorrow afternoon. Um... When do you think I can come and see him tomorrow afternoon? Please let me check... Tomorrow afternoon... Yes, he'll be free from 3:00 tomorrow afternoon. Do you think it's convenient for you? Yes, that's quite all right for me. Can we change it? All right. Let's change it. Tomorrow afternoon at three. I am going to schedule it for that time and inform Mr.Liu about the change.
local_seq: Thank you very much. See you tomorrow afternoon.

global_seq: Dad, how can we get to the zoo? We can take a bus there. Does this bus go there? I think so.
local_seq: Let's step in, Dad.

global_seq: No, it's too crowded. Dad. Here comes another bus. Fine. Let's get on. Oh, no, Judy! Get off the bus quickly! Why? Dad?
local_seq: We got on the wrong bus.

global_seq: How do we do timesheets here? They are actually fairly straightforward. Do you know where the blanks are kept? Yes, I already have one. OK, well after you take one out of that second drawer, you put your name on the top. Do you see?
local_seq: I am kind of confused.

global_seq: Next you fill in all of your hours for each day and total them. Do you know how to show time on a 24 - hour clock? I'm not quite sure. Midnight is zero and when you put the minutes in, make sure that you show them with a dot followed by the minutes. Do you understand? No, I have no idea what you are talking about.
local_seq: It's easy, just write in the hours, total it, sign it, and put it in the box.

global_seq: Is Betty Sue in her office? I’ m sorry. She’ s in a meeting right now. I see. Can I give her a message for you?
local_seq: Yes, please tell her I stopped by.

global_seq: Excuse me, where am I on this map? You're right here, bus station, we are in the center of the city. Which bus should I take to railway station? You can take a No. 2 bus here.
local_seq: Where am I supposed to change?

global_seq: Where can I find a spare hose for the pump? What size do you need? 25 mm diameter. They're at the back of the stores, second shelf up on the right-hand side.
local_seq: Thanks. Have you got any light bulbs?

global_seq: They're in the blue cupboard. Anything else? Oh yes, some wire cutters. I’ ll need to check. Sorry, we don’ t have any in stock. But I can order some and send through the order today. How many do you need? Just one pair.
local_seq: Fine. They should be here the day after tomorrow.

global_seq: Are you going home now? No, I'm not. What are you going to do? Are you going to work late? No, I'm not. I'm going to look for an apartment.
local_seq: An apartment? Why?

global_seq: I'm going to try to find a place near the office. Where are you living now? Out in the suburbs.It ' s a long trip to work every day. How are you going to find an apartment?
local_seq: I'm going to buy a newspaper and check the classified ads.

global_seq: Well, we've finally put the finishing touches on the training programs for next year. Here's a report showing the projected costs as well as the expected return on investment. Return on investment? How can you have a return on this kind of investment? Can you really calculate the value of these training programs? Sure! It's not a real figure, of course. It's just an estimate based on rehiring costs, and the potential lost revenue that results from incompetence. Wow! I'm impressed. So, what's in the cards for future training? Will it be in-house or off-site?
local_seq: A little of both. We'll have a few daylong sessions for things like business writing skills and software training. Those are available to everyone. We also have a variety of other programs

global_seq: I opened my mail, found this eviction notice, and don’ t know what to do with it. Actually, it is a 30 - day notice to vacate the premises. Just for being a few days late? This isn’ t the first time you have been considerably late with the rent. I need to start the procedure to evict you.
local_seq: Are you taking my apartment away?

global_seq: This is a notice to inform you that the sheriff will evict you in 30 days if you do not pay up on your rent. Can I keep the apartment if I pay my rent in full? You can keep the apartment if you stay caught up on your rent. Otherwise, I need to find someone who can make the payments. I will go write a check right now.
local_seq: Thank you. I will need a cashier’ s check or cash, please.

global_seq: Egg, this bathroom is a pigsty! Helen, why do you keep flushing the toilet? What's wrong? I just can't stand it. It's really gross in here! There ' s a stain on the toilet seat, and the floor was wet and slippery. So I cleaned it! You did what? Helen, I know it's gross, but I ' Ve seen many public washrooms that are much worse. Why are you cleaning the counter top? are you out of your mind?
local_seq: I can't help myself ; it's just so disgusting in here!

global_seq: What do you want to do tonight? I don't know. What do you want to do? I have no idea. Do you think we're in a rut? What do you mean?
local_seq: Well, we do the same things every weekend. We go to the same restaurants. We see the same friends. You know what I mean?

global_seq: Yeah, I guess you're right. It's easy to get bogged down in the day to day, and forget to change things up once in a while. Let's break out and do something completely different tonight. Okay, I'll look in the events section of the paper to see what's going on tonight. Hmm, we could go to a concert. There is a good one tonight. I bet it's not sold out. But, we'll have to drive an hour to the venue. An hour? That's a bit of a bummer. Let me take a peek and see what else there is. How about going dancing? We haven't done that in a while. There's a club in Silver Lake that's supposed to be hopping on Friday nights. Eddie from work told me that they have a really good DJ and a big dance floor, and the cover charge isn't bad. I'm not really in the mood for dancing, actually. You know what? I just feel like staying home tonight and vegging, after all. How about you?
local_seq: Yeah, I was hoping you'd say that. It's nice to have the option to go out but I'd rather stay in. Maybe we can go out tomorrow night.

global_seq: This is Action 5 News reporter Sarah O’ Connell reporting live from Washington, D. C. where a protest has broken out. Thousands of angry citizens are protesting against the proposed bailout of the auto manufacturing industry! Sir, sir, Sarah O’ Connell, Action 5 news. Can you tell us what’ s happening? Yeah, yeah, we’ re here because we feel this is an injustice! The financial irresponsibility of big business has to stop! We’ re there to show the government that we don’ t like the way that they’ re spending our tax dollars! Sir but what exactly is making everyone so angry? It’ s an absolute outrage, Sarah, the US government wants to give 25 billion dollars of taxpayers’ money to the auto industry. These are companies that have been mismanaged and are now nearly bankrupt.
local_seq: I see. But, many supporters of the bailout argue that it could help save the jobs of millions of hardworking Americans.

global_seq: Mom, I want to move out. Hey, sounds great to me, kid. What kind of job did you find? Job? Yes, job. If you’ re going to live on your own, you have to pay for rent and everything else.
local_seq: I thought I could just get you and Dad to pay for an apartment. I found a cheap one.

global_seq: Would you please take a seat over there? There are some interesting magazines on the coffee-table. Thank you. How long it take to get my son's hair cut? It shouldn't be long. Thirty minutes, tops. Are you in a hurry? No. I'm thinking that maybe I can get my hair shampooed.
local_seq: Good idea. Do you want a wash or a massage? Massage is especially good when you are tired.

global_seq: How come? Because it helps you speed up your circulation. Then I won't say no to that. How do you like it?
local_seq: I feel totally refreshed.

global_seq: Hello, May I help you? Yes, we're interested in seeing the rooms for rent. Oh, how nice! There are bright rooms and the house is very quiet. That is exactly what we're looking for.
local_seq: Well, each room is 40 dollars a week.

global_seq: That sounds all right to us. When do you want to move in? How about tomorrow afternoon? Fine, I'll be expecting you.
local_seq: See you tomorrow.

global_seq: I need to get my prescription filled. You may pick it up in twenty minutes. If I wanted to, could I have it mailed to me? Yes, and you can renew this prescription by phone.
local_seq: Are there any special instructions about this medication?

global_seq: Take it three times a day. Can I take it with food? You should take this medicine with food and no alcohol. Are there any side effects with this medication?
local_seq: You might get a little dizzy, but that is it.

global_seq: How much for a bus pass? Well, for a monthly pass, it'll cost you $ 65. Is there anything else that doesn't cost as much? If you're a student, you can get a student bus pass.
local_seq: How much does a student pass cost?

global_seq: That actual bus pass is free. It doesn't cost anything? The only thing you'll have to pay for is the monthly sticker. Can you tell me how much that'll cost?
local_seq: It's only $ 24 a month.

global_seq: Excuse me, how many sightseeing spots are there in the park? There are about 20 main spots and some other small spots. Do I have to buy extra ticket if I want to visit the main spots? Yes, some of the spots charges separately.
local_seq: Well, do you have through tickets?

global_seq: Can I see some men's watches? Of course. How about this one? What functions does this watch have? It's a luminous watch with a time-reminder function.
local_seq: Is it waterproof?

global_seq: Excuse me. Can I change my seat with you? I want to sit beside my friend. Where is your seat? It's 9 - A in the middle part, a window seat too. OK, you mean the vacant one on the left?
local_seq: Yes, it is. Thank you very much. Let me help you to carry your baggage there.

global_seq: I'll be glad when winter comes. Why is that? Because I love the snow. Yes, the snow is fun.
local_seq: Last year we made a big snowman.

global_seq: How big was it? It was seven feet tall. How long did it take? It took us all day.
local_seq: Did you give him a nose?

global_seq: Are the expressions of sight draft, time draft, usance draft and letter of credit adequate terms to express the different methods of payment? No. These terms need to be amplified. What if the sale is made on the basis of sight draft? Then the shipping documents have to be attached. That way, both parties confirm the documents that will accompany the draft and constitute evidence of shipment in compliance with the contract terms.
local_seq: Therefore, we must be very careful in building up clear expressions and complete understanding on both sides of trade.

global_seq: How have you been feeling lately? I’ Ve been feeling a little light-headed lately. Has your blood pressure been high before? If I have high blood pressure, it is news to me.
local_seq: Usually people with high blood pressure have no symptoms, so we call it the silent killer.

global_seq: What do you use to check for high blood pressure? I am going to put a cuff on you to get a reading. What does the reading tell you? I get an idea of the pressure in your arteries when your heart is pumping blood versus at rest.
local_seq: I hope that the test results show me to be really healthy.

global_seq: Miss, may I help you? Yes, I just wondered why the price between the ninth and tenth floor is so different. It's because of the view. Oh! I see. Can you show me the location of Block I?
local_seq: Sure. Please take a look at the model of the building. Nice Garden has a total of two blocks which are labeled Block I and Block II. Block I has a total of thirty-eighth floors. The thirty-seventh and thirty-eighth are penthouses. There are four units in one floor. The sizes of the units are one thousand square feet and one thousand and five hundred square feet. The size with one thousand square feet has three bedrooms and the biggest size has four bedrooms.

global_seq: How many elevators are there? There are three elevators between one hundred and forty-eight units. How about the car-park space? There are a total of one hundred and sixty parking spaces on the second and third floor, in which twelve are for visitors and the rest are for residents.
local_seq: Any other facilities?

global_seq: Sure, on the fourth floor is a recreation quarter. There are two swimming pools. One is Olympic standard size and the other one is for children. Also, there is a gymnasium for resident members only. What is the completion date? The completion date will be July 1st 2007. How about the price and the bank mortgage?
local_seq: Please check up the price list. The average unit price is five million Hong Kong dollars. There are eight different banks that will provide a seventy percent mortgage loan. Also, the developer will offer another ten percent mortgage to purchasers.

global_seq: You've got a beautiful singing voice! It's this high-tech equipment that doctors my voice a little. Actually, i am tone-deaf. Come on, You hit the high notes perfectly! Well, the echo and the stereo system helped a lot. And i know that song very well, so, i didn't need to pay attention to the subtitles which helped as well.
local_seq: You're too modest. Pass me the catalogue! I'd like to see which song to choose.Wow, this place has a large selection of songs. I dont know which to choose!

global_seq: Pick the one that you always sing in the shower. Funny.Oh, i like this song. It's by one of my favorite singers. Read me the index number! 1021.It ' s a duet! Come on, Pick the mic and sing along!
local_seq: No. I need a rest!

global_seq: Mom, I don't feel well. Are you sick? I feel dizzy. Let me take your temperature.
local_seq: Mom, I don't want to go to see a doctor.

global_seq: Good afternoon, Mr. Yang. I'm Jill, Mr. Smith's secretary. Would you like to look around the factory first? Yes, I would. Now this is our office block. We have all the administrative departments Sales, Accounting, Personnel, Market Research and so on. What's that building opposite us?
local_seq: That's the warehouse where the larger items of medical instruments are stored. We keep a stock of the fast-moving items so that urgent orders can be met quickly from stock. ( in the workshop ) This is one of our three workshops. This is the delivery bay here.

global_seq: How do you use an ATM card, Billy? It’ s easy, grandpa. Insert you card into the machine here. Then wait a moment. OK. Now you enter your PIN. It should have four numbers. Oh yes. I’ Ve got it written down here. Just a minute. You really shouldn’ t write it down. You should memorise it. You can change it to a more convenient number if you like.
local_seq: OK, I’ Ve entered my PIN. There are several options on the screen. I guess I just choose which service I want, don't I?

global_seq: How have you been doing? I can’ t sleep or eat. I have a really bad pain in my tooth! How long have you had this toothache? It bothers me off and on, but it’ s gotten much worse these past few weeks.
local_seq: Is there anything that you’ Ve done to your tooth that might have caused the pain?

global_seq: My girlfriend told me that I grind my teeth a lot when I sleep. Maybe that is the problem. When you brush your teeth, what do you use? I use a soft bristle toothbrush. Does it bother you when you have to chew a lot?
local_seq: Absolutely. That set it off big time!

global_seq: The doctor sent me over here to have my blood drawn. Certainly, please have a seat and roll up your left sleeve. What is this test for? Well, today your doctor wants us to check your white blood cell count.
local_seq: What does that tell him?

global_seq: Well, if it is elevated, you might have an infection. Will the blood test hurt? It is only a little pin stick. I am going to put a tourniquet on your arm to puff your veins up. Ouch!
local_seq: There we go! I got the blood that I needed.

global_seq: Excuse me, do you speak English? Yes, do you need some help? Actually, yes. Could you show me how to use my key card? Yes, sure. You need to put your card in the slot.
local_seq: Ok, like this?

global_seq: Anything else I can do for you? I need ten 55 cents stamps and ten 32 cents stamps, please. OK, here you are.Anything else? Yes, I need to send the payment to immigration for my aunt's citizenship application. They won't accept checks.How do I send the money?
local_seq: You can buy a money order and mail mature immigration.

global_seq: Then I need a money order for 250 dollars. Please fill out the form for the money order.You also need to pay a one dollar fee. Thank youse much for all your help. You're welcome.Have a nice day.
local_seq: You, too.

global_seq: Well, we've been waiting for our luggage for about one hour. What kind of bag is it? It's blue, Samsonite bag. What are your room number and your name, please?
local_seq: This is room eleven-seven and my name is Terry Chen.

global_seq: Hello, Matt! Hello, Todd! Matt, I'm going to ask you some questions about pet.First question, do you have a pet? Yes, in fact, my mom's house we have three, three pets. two dogs and a cat. My family actually raises dogs for helping blind people.
local_seq: Wow, like how do they train the dogs?

global_seq: How do they train the dogs? Well, I mean, it's a long process, right... we get them when they're puppies... and so we train them basic... you know, sit, come... really basic things... then, after they're about two year old, they go a different training school. Well, how many dogs do they train at a time? Oh, just one! We have our own dog, and then we have a dog that we have that we are training. Do you ever see the dogs you trained, like out on the street, or anything?
local_seq: Sometimes we'll see them, they'll have like sort of conventions of reunions of the pets so, yeah, you get to see them once in awhile.

global_seq: I can't find my glasses and I can't see anything. Can you help me find a few things? No problem. What are you looking for? My laptop, do you see it? Yes, your laptop is on the chair.
local_seq: Where's my book?

global_seq: Which one? The dictionary. It's under the table. Where's my pencil?
local_seq: There's a pencil in front of the lamp.

global_seq: That's not a pencil. That's a pen. Oh, sorry. There is a pencil behind the cup. How about my backpack? Do you know where that is? It's in between the wall and the bed.
local_seq: Where are my shoes?

global_seq: They're on the left side of the TV. I don't see them. Sorry, I made a mistake. They're on the right side of the TV. Thanks.
local_seq: Oh, and here are your glasses. They were next to your cell phone.

global_seq: I don't know how to adjust my life. Would you give me a piece of advice? You look a bit pale, don't you? Yes, I can't sleep well every night. You should get plenty of sleep.
local_seq: I drink a lot of wine.

global_seq: If I were you, I wouldn't drink too much. I often feel so tired. You better do some exercise every morning. I sometimes find the shadow of death in front of me.
local_seq: Why do you worry about your future? You're very young, and you'll make great contribution to the world. I hope you take my advice.

global_seq: What time does the train for Boston leave? 9:25 on Platform 12, Track B. When does it arrive? It should be there at 11:45, but it may be a little late.
local_seq: How much is a one-way ticket?

global_seq: Excuse me, is this personnel division? Yes. What can I do for you? I came about your advertisement for a senior production planner. What’ s your name?
local_seq: My name is Li Jean.

global_seq: You have been in Peking University, hadn't you? Yes, seven years. What degree do you have now? : Master of Marketing Management.
local_seq: Do you have any experience in this field?

global_seq: Yes. I worked at AB Company. Why are you interested in the position? Because you need a senior production planner who is good at mathematics and fluent in English. I think I am fit for the position. All right. If we decide to hire you, we'd pay you 5,000 yuan a month at the start. How do you think about it?
local_seq: That's very good.

global_seq: Hi, taxi. Get in, please. Where to, madam? The international airport, please. I have to be there by 8 I can't promise anything, but I'll try my best.
local_seq: Oh, that's my stop. How much do I need to pay?

global_seq: What arrangement will you make about payment? We shall open an irrevocable L / C to cover our shipment from Shanghai to Hamburg. Is it at sight or after sight? At sight of course. Some customers demand that 80 % of the credit amount be paid at sight, and the rest be paid after the machines are proved satisfactory on trial.
local_seq: I am afraid that can't be done. We have never done business on such terms.

global_seq: But such terms are quite common in the machinery trade. Other suppliers are offering better terms. Some even allow payment 60days after sight. We ask for full payment at sight, because we guarantee 90 % mechanical efficiency for all our products. You don't have the same guarantee from other suppliers. The usual percentage is around 85. That's true. I'm eager to know if you could send some fitters to ensure good operation. Yes. We usually send technicians abroad to offer after-sales service to our customers.
local_seq: If you send fitters along with the machines to ensure that all the machines run properly, and if you provide after-sales service, we agree to make the payment in full.

global_seq: Hey Lisa... want to grab lunch with me? Sure, Emily. We haven't done that in a while. Yeah... actually, we haven't hung out at all recently. You seem sort of under the weather. Is there something going on? Well, keep this under your hat, but I think I'm going to quit after New Year.
local_seq: Quit this company? Oh... wow.

global_seq: I know I should be pretty happy here, but I'm not finding the kind of job satisfaction I need. I'm a good graphic designer... One of the best in the company. That's kind of you to say. But... the stuff we do here hasn't really challenged me very much at all. Oh, I get it. Simply put, you're bored, huh?
local_seq: That's one way of putting it. For me, a job needs to stimulate my brain, otherwise it becomes a daily drudgery.

global_seq: Taxi! Where would you like to go? Please rush me to the railway station Get in and close the door.
local_seq: Can you speed up a bit?

global_seq: Sorry. The road is too crowded. But I have no time to lose. But I can't help it. Can you drop me off here?
local_seq: Sorry. We mustn't stop here.

global_seq: I hear that you've got a chance to go to Europe for a half-year training program. Is it true? Yes, I'm leaving on the 14th of next month. Congratulations! How can you get such a good opportunity to be trained overseas? Actually, it is a policy in my company. The human resources management department has connections overseas this year, so we can receive training there.
local_seq: How nice! But will you have to pay for the training?

global_seq: So awful! I never fancy my salary is so little. Oh, don't be so sad. You can ask for a salary raise. Bingo! I never thought about that before. I am working so hard and my accomplishment is significant, you know. So you suppose you deserve a salary raise.
local_seq: I know I deserve it, but I can not find a way to talk with boss about this.

global_seq: You ought to point out how valuable you are, and tell her those people who have the same situation also get the salary raise. That sounds reasonable. Remember it is the boss who hires you and tell her how much you have improved the office efficiency. That's a point. It seems a little complicated. I will think about this for a while. I owe you one. After all, you give me an inspiration.
local_seq: Forget it. Good luck. I hope you can make it.

global_seq: Welcome back, Sir. I trust the materials were helpful to you? Indeed. I've decided to go for the Petty Consumer Loan. That is, if my credit rating is satisfactory. Your credit is fine, Sir. Now, tell me, what is it that you need the loan for? I've just bought a second hand apartment and I'm looking to do some renovations. You know, a bit of decorating, some new furniture, nothing flashy.
local_seq: I see. And what loan amount are you expecting?

global_seq: It says here that the maximum is 20,000 RIB. Is that flexible? I'm sorry, Sir. The maximum we can lend you on this type of loan is 20,000 RIB, with no exceptions. Well, 20,000 RIB, it'll have to be then. I need some documentation from you. Such as your resident permit, your occupation and salary details and I already have your credit details here.
local_seq: Everything is right here. If that's all in order, just let me know where I sign.

global_seq: Good afternoon, Mr Meng. It's a little late for you, isn't it? Hello, Miao Ping. Yes, I've been stuck in back to back meetings all day, but I really wanted to come and speak to you. What can I help you with? I'm interested in putting some of my money into investment tools, you know, something other than stocks and such like. Do you have any ideas?
local_seq: Mmmm... yes, many investors don't seem to be into stocks at the moment. Too risky! How about Open-Ended funds?

global_seq: Yes, I've heard about that. Isn't it where many investors pool their money together? Exactly. Then each individual has the chance to diversify their portfolio over many different areas, it doesn't have to be stocks. And, we provide a Professional Fund Manager, so you know your investment will be safe with us. How can you help me to decide which areas to invest in? Our Investment Financing Service will help you choose where to put your funds and look at both the pros and cons of each.
local_seq: Is this the information here? Well, let's take a look then...

global_seq: Looking through your C. V., I see that you graduated from Oklahoma State University. Can you tell me what training you have had that would specifically relate to the cable television Industry? Well, I’ Ve attended some conferences in this field. But the most relevant training I’ Ve had was in computer design. I believe I could integrate that knowledge with my college degree to design I see. Did you have anything specific in mind? Well, I notice that you currently provide an on-screen TV Guide. At the moment, it just scrolls the names of the programs in a repeated loop. If you have many channels, you have to wait a long t
local_seq: That’ s impressive. How would you make that pay?

global_seq: Excuse me, I’ Ve been waiting here for fifteen minutes.Do you know why the traffic is so heavy? A lorry overturned on the road and blocked it, so all the traffic was held up. Oh, what a terrible situation! This traffic is unbearable. Yeah, traffic was brought to a standstill by the accident. If we had gone early we would miss the traffic.
local_seq: I agree with you. But now we have to wait. The sky is overcast, and it is very sultry. I fear a thunder storm is brewing.

global_seq: Hello. Gail Willows speaking. Ms Willows, hello. This is Daniel calling from IBA Bank. Hello, Daniel. What can I do for you? I'm calling to notify you that an Export L / C has arrived for you.
local_seq: Oh, really? Do you know which company it's from?

global_seq: Hello! How can I help you, sir? I want to take out a loan for school. What kind of interest rate do you offer? Do you qualify for any of the Federal loan programs? Yes, but I need to borrow some more money.
local_seq: Well. In that case we can offer you a private educational loan.

global_seq: What's the interest rate? It's 7.2 %, fixed-rate loan. How do I go about taking it out? Just fill out this application. We can let you know right away if you qualify.
local_seq: All right, thank you!

global_seq: Honey, can you set the table? Um, sure. What are we having for dinner? Do I need to put out anything in particular? Well, make sure to put out the pepper and salt shakers. I don’ t know if your brother is coming tonight so set an extra place mat just in case. Ok, should I use the fancy silverware?
local_seq: Yeah, go ahead, forks, spoons and knives. I roasted some meat so be sure to put out some steak knives as well.

global_seq: Would you like to see our new shirts? Sorry, but I’ m not really interested in those things. But they’ re very nice, you know. Really.
local_seq: And not expensive either.

global_seq: Oh, I don’ t care about that. Everybody is buying them. Are they? Yes, they’ re very fashionable, you see.
local_seq: I’ m afraid I’ m not interested in fashion.

global_seq: Welcome to our International Business Counter. How can I help? Hello. I'm trying to track down some documents due to arrive any day on our new L / C. Not a problem. Could you tell me you L / C number, please? It's TH 15699324873 0.
local_seq: OK, just checking for you... yes, they have arrived. How would you like me to handle them?

global_seq: Hello, may I help you? Yes.We ' re interested in seeing the rooms for rent. Oh, how nice.They ' re bright rooms and the house is very quiet. A nice quiet house is exactly what we're looking for.
local_seq: Well, gentleman.Each room is $ 40 a week if you think that's OK.

global_seq: Besides, yours don't have side pockets like mine. Cool! They're big! What have you got in there? Just the necessities Are you planning a trip to the Outback?
local_seq: No, but you never know when you'll need a flashlight.

global_seq: Reservations. Can I help you? I'd like to book a room, please. How long will you be staying, sir? Four nights, from October 15th.
local_seq: What kind of room do you want?

global_seq: Do you have any plan to buy a house in this city? Absolutely we need a house here. But what makes me upset is the prices in this city. Our monthly salary can not buy one square meter of the house here. It is depressing to hear the price goes higher and higher.
local_seq: More and more people need to buy houses, but the market can not meet the needs, so this caused the bubble in real estate industry.

global_seq: Good afternoon. Can I help you? Yes, we have a reservation for three nights.Mona White. I called last week. One moment please, Ms White.
local_seq: Yes, that was for two single rooms, wasn't it?

global_seq: I've reserved rooms 402 and 403 for you. Are they quiet rooms? Well they are facing the street but there's a lovely view.
local_seq: We'd like quiet rooms thanks.

global_seq: What's up? Nothing, how about you? Next Saturday, I'm going to have a party. Oh, really?
local_seq: You are coming?

global_seq: Probably not. Why is that? I don't feel like going. Why not?
local_seq: I really can't stand going to parties.

global_seq: You must know you've been scheduled to have an operation the day after Yes. But I don't know the exact time. The operation starts at 10 0 ' clock. But you'll get an injection of anaesthesia about 30 to 45 minutes in advance. If your family comes to see you before the operation, they should come before 8: 30. Oh, I see. I will tell my wife. Thank you for telling me so much.
local_seq: It's nothing. Did your doctor explain to you about what operation you are going to have?

global_seq: I am sorry to say this but I seem to have lost the key to the safe. Where do you think you lost it? Outside the hotel? Yes, I believe so. How should I compensate for this? I am afraid, Ma'am, you have to pay 100 US dollars since you lost the key.
local_seq: What? 100 US dollars? Is it covered by the insurance?

global_seq: Where are you going, Jane? I'm going to the hospital to see Susan. I saw her yesterday. She was a little better. Must I catch a number 7 bus to get there?
local_seq: No, you needn't. A number 13 bus will also take you to the hospital.

global_seq: I think I may rent out this apartment that I found. Oh, really? Where’ d you find it? I was looking through the ads today, and I found it in there. In the ads? Are you serious?
local_seq: Yeah, and it’ s affordable too.

global_seq: I’ d like to hear about this apartment. First of all, it’ s absolutely gorgeous. What is the rent each month? It’ s only $ 725 a month.
local_seq: That’ s amazing. The rent is very cheap.

global_seq: Excuse me. Yes? I'm in a hurry. How long will it take? About half an hour, if there's no traffic jam.
local_seq: Do you think the traffic will be heavy?

global_seq: Hi Benjamin. My name is Dr. Green. What seems to be the matter? I've been feeling pretty ill for a few days now. What are your symptoms? I feel chilly, I've got cramps, I keep throwing up, and I feel dizzy and tired.
local_seq: It sounds like you might be a bit dehydrated. Do you feel thirsty most of the day?

global_seq: Yes. I can't seem to drink enough. Have you been drinking plenty of water? No, just soda. Ok. Well, we'll have a nurse take some blood in a few minutes to see if you're dehydrated. First, let me feel your pulse.
local_seq: That seems to be a bit low, but that's not uncommon when you're ill.

global_seq: What is your temperature now? My temperature is 39 degrees centigrade. How high was your temperature yesterday? I didn't take my temperature but I felt feverish.
local_seq: Will you open your mouth? Your throat is swollen.

global_seq: Is there anything I can do for you? Yes. I have my wallet stolen. When did you lose it? I don't know the exact time. Maybe I lost it last night when I was traveling on the bus.
local_seq: Can you make a description of your wallet?

global_seq: Are you ready to order? Yes, I’ ll have the Texas chili burger. Would you like fries with that? A large, with tons of ketchup.
local_seq: And to drink?

global_seq: What can I do? The system crashed when I was surfing on the internet. Did you go to any illegal website? No, But does that matter?
local_seq: Yes, your computer can be easily infected by virus if you do that.

global_seq: I see. I'd better never try. That's wise. Do you know what's wrong with my PC? One minute. Oh, yes, it was infected by a virus, and you had no antivirus software.
local_seq: Is anti-virus software necessary for a PC?

global_seq: Excuse me, could you tell me which line I’ m supposed to stand in to buy bubble wrap and to post a package? You can buy the bubble wrap here, but you’ ll have to stand in line over here to post your package. That’ s a really long line. How long do you think it’ ll take to get through all those people? It takes about 3 minutes per person, so it’ ll probably be about an hour’ s wait.
local_seq: Can I buy stamps here?

global_seq: Sure. How many would you like? I need 30 for my Christmas cards. Are you sending them abroad? Twenty of them are going abroad to China and America.
local_seq: Do you have any going anywhere in the EU? If you do, those are less expensive.

global_seq: No. Ok, here you go. That will be 18 pounds and seventy two pence. And the bubble wrap? That’ s another quid.
local_seq: Thanks a lot. You’ Ve been very helpful.

global_seq: Good morning, Madam. Can I help you? Yes, I’ Ve come to inquire about a 6,000- dollar remittance from California. Has it arrived? May I have your name, please? My name is Jenny Clinton.
local_seq: I see. Wait for a moment please. I am sorry, Mrs. Clinton, but the remittance doesn't appear to have arrived yet.

global_seq: Really? It should have arrived. It was sent a week ago. If the money was sent by cable, it would have taken about one or two days. But if it was sent by airmail, it would take at least one week. Well, then I'll come again the day after tomorrow. Or would you like us to phone you when the money arrives?
local_seq: That would be very kind of you.

global_seq: Hi. Are you new in this class? Yes, I am. I really don’ t know anyone. Did you just arrive in this country? You look a little nervous. No. I was here last semester, but I didn’ t find out about this class in time. So I’ m taking it this semester.
local_seq: I took this course last semester too. Now I am taking it again!

global_seq: Welcome to our company Mr white. My name is Yan Hua, the secretary of Mr Wang. Nice to meet you! Would you like to have a cup of tea or coffee? Thank you. I'd like Chinese tea very much!
local_seq: Glad you like it. By the way, is this your first time to China, Mr. White?

global_seq: Yes, as a representative of IBM. I hope to conclude some business with you. We also hope to expand our business with you. This is our common desire. I think you probably know China has adopted a flexible policy in her foreign trade.
local_seq: Yes, I have read about it, but I would like to know more about it.

global_seq: Do you have any direct flights to Toronto? Sorry, we don't. But I think you can fly on Northwest Airlines to Berlin and then have a connecting flight on Canada Airline to Toronto. And it is the most economical flight, just 1,900 dollars. When does the flight depart? At 8 am. By the way, it also makes a refueling stop.
local_seq: How long is the layover?

global_seq: Less than one hour. And how long do I have to stay in Berlin for the connecting flight? Not so long, just one hour. So the time for the total journey is about...?
local_seq: About 13 hours.

global_seq: I'm checking out now. Can I have my bill, please? Sure. What's your room number, sir? It's 876. Here is my key card. A minute, please. It's 6215 yuan all together, tax included.
local_seq: Can I pay with traveler's check?

global_seq: Good morning, sir. What can I do for you? I am leaving at 10, so I'd like to settle my account now. Yes, sir. May I have your room number? My room number is 1010 and the name is Ted Black.
local_seq: Right, just wait a minute. I will get your bill ready for you right away.

global_seq: Thanks. Have you used your mini-bar since breakfast? No, I haven't. Very good sir. Here is your bill. Please check and sign it.
local_seq: Ok. Excuse me, what's this charge for?

global_seq: That's for the breakfast you ordered from the service. Oh, yes. It's on Wednesday morning. Sorry about that. That's all right. Well, it's all together $ 260. Here you are.
local_seq: Thank you. Have a nice trip.

global_seq: Put all baggage on the conveyor belt.Walk through the detector gate one at a time, please. Excuse me, ma'ma. Could you walk back through the doorway again, please? What for? Airport security.Could you empty your pockets over here, please?
local_seq: Really? I'm in a hurry.All right.

global_seq: Lucy, take my picture here, OK? Sure. Just a minute. Let me take my camera out. What's the matter? I'm not sure.
local_seq: Is it broken?

global_seq: I hope not! Oh, I see. What is it? The batteries are worn down. I need replace them. Where can we get batteries?
local_seq: All photography shops carry them.

global_seq: Why are you reading the classifieds? What do you need? I’ m looking for a bookcase, but I don’ t want to buy a new one. Are you having any luck? Not really. There aren’ t any used bookcases listed. But there are a few rummage sales on Saturday. I think I’ ll go to them.
local_seq: Do you mind if I go with you?

global_seq: Well, how does it look? It's a perfect fit. Let me pay for it now. Cash, credit card, or debit card?
local_seq: I think I'll use my credit card.

global_seq: Hello, I need a wake-up call tomorrow morning. Of course. When would you like the call? Actually, I need two calls, one at 7 and the other at 7 fifteen. No problem. We'll give you both calls.
local_seq: Do you know what, let's change the second call to 7 thirty.

global_seq: Welcome. How can I help you? We want to look at some of your products. This way please. We have a full range of products from cosmetics to skin cleansers. Could you commend me some moisturizers?
local_seq: Your T-zone gets oily easily, but your cheeks are dry in winter. Am I right?

global_seq: Yes, that's right. This " Cream of Olives " is our bestseller for combination skin. You can try it on your hand. Oh, very good. I will buy this one. All right. Anything else?
local_seq: No. Thank you.

global_seq: Stephanie! Did you just get to school? But you were up and about when I left the dorm this morning! That was about an hour and a half ago. This happens all the time! Why do you always take so long to get ready the morning? It’ s a skill. What can I say? I don’ t know why, I just have a long routine. Please explain because it makes no sense to me. How can a girl’ s routine be so complicated? You get up, you shower, you get dressed, you brush your teeth, you’ re out the door. Half an hour, tops. Jacob, you have the luxury of having a haircut that rarely needs styling. I don’ t. I have to set aside about an hour and a half to get ready in the mornings. Every day, I wake up and head straight for the shower. Every second day, I wash my hair. If it’ s a hair-washing day, I frequently need to wash my hair twice because it gets really oily. Then I usually put in a conditioner and have to rinse that out too. Because my hair is so long, I seldom manage to take a shower in under twenty minutes. Afterwards, I often put on a pot of coffee and get dressed while I wait for it to brew. I take a long time to get dressed in the morning. Every now and then I remember to choose my outfit the night before, but usually I do it in the morning. In all, getting dressed takes about half an hour, at which time my hair is now semi-dry so then I have to style my hair. From time to time I’ ll put my hair up, but oftentimes I bloody it straight. And then, because of the texture of my hair, I regularly have to flat-iron it to keep it from frizzing. That’ s another twenty minutes or so. After that, I have my daily makeup routine.
local_seq: True, I hardly ever see you without your hair done and your makeup on, even when you show up to class in sweatpants. Tell me, how long does it take you to choose that outfit in the morning?

global_seq: I have redecorated my bedroom. I decide to repaint the walls and change the pictures. I also bought a new pair of curtains. What do you think of it? I think is looks great. I really like the light colors you have chosen. The pictures are nice too. Did you bought any new furniture? I bought a new mattress and some fresh bedclothes. I also bought a new dressing table and a new bedside table. new furniture makes a room seem so fresh. I see that you also bought a new lamp for your bedside table.
local_seq: do you think that I should get a new wardrobe?

global_seq: that wardrobe looks quite big. Is it full of clothes? yes. I have so many clothes stuffed into it. Perhaps I should get rid of some of them. There are clothes in there that I never wear anymore. I like to get rid of clothes that I don’ t wear rather than keeping them in a wardrobe. They take up too much space. There are several charity shops that you can give old clothes to. They will be that’ s a good idea. After I get rid of the old clothes I no longer wear, I can see what new clothes I need to buy.
local_seq: I need to buy some new clothes for the summer too. Perhaps we can go together one day.

global_seq: My pal, you are so nervous recently. You don't need to be like that. I am worried about that Arden will display all my drawbacks in the performance review. That will be embarrassing. Just use your head. If you were definitely making some big mistakes, you would be informed. I had a nightmare last night and I dreamt Arden told me that my performance fell short of his expectation. I was terrified to wake up after hearing that.
local_seq: That is merely a dream. Remember, there is always room for us to have further improvement. I think we did the good job in the whole period.

global_seq: I have the chills and an upset stomach. How long have you felt like this? For most of the week. It sounds as if you have a virus.
local_seq: What do you think I should do?

global_seq: Good Morning.What can I do for you? Good Morning, I have a bad cough, and I want to see an internist. Do you have a registration card? No, I don’ t. I ' m a tourist.
local_seq: Then you need to register as a new patient.Can I have a look at you ID card? I need your name, age, occupation, address and contacting number.

global_seq: Hi, Andy. I am going to Isabel’ s. Are you coming? No. The things are too expensive there for me. I can't afford it. That is no problem at all. Isabel’ s is having a clearance sale, and today is the last day. You don't want to miss such a good chance, do you? Really? That's wonderful. Can you wait a second? I need to change.
local_seq: All right, but hurry up. It takes you hours to change.

global_seq: I will. Do you think we can get something really nice and cheap? I mean this is the last day. I think so. They don't sell shoddy cloth for one thing. Should we ask Cindy to come along? She saw the evening gown made of silk last month that she wanted to buy very much. She didn't buy it of course. It would cost her three months’ salary. She already bought that evening gown.
local_seq: When?

global_seq: Hey there! I’ Ve been hoping to run into you. Are you busy tomorrow morning? Let me see... Wednesday morning. Yes, I am booked solid all morning. What’ s up? I was hoping to talk to you about the sales projections for next year. I’ m having a little trouble figuring out how to use the spreadsheet you set up for me. It has a lot of complicated form I can explain them to you. It’ ll just take about a half an hour. How about Friday afternoon?
local_seq: Ooh. Sorry, that’ s not good for me. I am tied up all day Friday. We’ ll have to do it next week. I am wide open then.

global_seq: Next time you buy veggies or fruits, have them bagged and weighed before you come here. Sorry. I didn't know. The total comes to US $ 65.81. How will you pay today? I'm going to use my ATM card.
local_seq: Slide your card through the card ID pad and punch in your PIN.

global_seq: Done. One moment. Do you want to withdraw some cash while you're at it? No, thanks. Paper or plastic?
local_seq: Pardon me?

global_seq: May, do you mind helping me prepare for the picnic? Sure. Have you checked the weather report? Yes. It says it will be sunny all day. No sign of rain at all.This is your father's favorite sausage. Sandwiches for you and Daniel. No, thanks Mom. I'd like some toast and chicken wings.
local_seq: Okay. Please take some fruit salad and crackers for me.

global_seq: Done. Oh, don't forget to take napkins disposable plates, cups and picnic blanket. All set. May, can you help me take all these things to the living room? Yes, madam. Ask Daniel to give you a hand?
local_seq: No, mom, I can manage it by myself. His help just causes more trouble.

global_seq: Hi, Deny. Are still working? Hi, Navy. Come in please. I'm just putting away on my books. So, you are leaving, aren't you? yes, I'm going to take a holiday tomorrow.
local_seq: How nice! I can see you are busying packing. I'm sorry to interrupt you.

global_seq: That's all right. I'm almost finished. Do you need my help? Yes, could you please go over this for me? and see if there is any mistake in it? All right I'll read it soon. Excuse me for taking your time.
local_seq: Oh. It's nothing Navy.

global_seq: Could you tell me something about your previous job? Yes. I worked in a small machinery factory. My work was very simple and there was not much work to do. Didn't you like it? No, I thought it was too dull. I'm capable of more responsibilities, so I decided to change my job.
local_seq: Why do you choose our company?

global_seq: John, I was talking to the travel agent about where we might be taking our vacation this year. I am going fishing in Alaska with my friend, Mark. What are you talking about? What's wrong with heading out with Mark for vacation?
local_seq: You and I have been together for a whole year, and our vacation time should be about the two of us!

global_seq: Which kinds of meat are most popular in your country? We eat a lot of chicken, pork and beef.You eat those meat a lot in your country too, don’ t you? Yes, we do.We also eat a lot of lamb. Yes. I’ Ve heard that people in your country like to eat lamb chops.
local_seq: That’ s right.They taste so good.We eat them with mint sauce.Have you ever tried them?

global_seq: Have you found another job yet, Sally? No, I haven't, but I've seen several interesting advertisements in the paper. What kind of job are you looking for? Either something in the hotel business or something to do with travel.
local_seq: You haven't had any experience in either of those fields.

global_seq: Come on in. Let me show you around. Here’ s the living room. Great. The view from this window is wonderful. This is the kitchen. It looks new.
local_seq: Yes. We just renovated a few month ago.

global_seq: I like it. Here’ s the master bedroom. Wow, it’ s nice. What did you say about the rent? $ 900 a month.
local_seq: Does that include utilities?

global_seq: Yes. It includes electricity, water, gas and cable, but the telephone is extra. When will it be available? The end of this month. I like it a lot but I need to talk with my wife. Can you hold it for me for two days?
local_seq: Sure.

global_seq: Hello. Is everything OK? Can I help you? Oh, wonderful! You speak English! I need to exchange this foreign currency. That's no problem. Is it cash? It's Traveller's Cheques, is that possible?
local_seq: Of course. If you could sign your name on the bottom line here, and write your address here. And please sign and date the back of every cheque and of course I'll need to see your passport.

global_seq: Would you please recommend a diamond for me? OK. How about this diamond necklace? I prefer a diamond mounted in a ring. Then. I'm sure you will like this one.
local_seq: Do you guarantee its quality?

global_seq: Good morning, sir. May I help you? Yes, thank you. I want to get a handbag. Do you want it for yourself or for your girlfriend? No, I have no girlfriend.
local_seq: Please excuse me for what I said just now. What do you think of this one?

global_seq: I am afraid it is too big. Sorry. It is the smallest size we have. Too bad. But, is there any other leather store nearby? Oh, yes. There is a big one at the right corner of the street. Perhaps you will get one there.
local_seq: I hope so. Thanks.

global_seq: So people can go and root for their old school team? Yep. And relive those good old high school days. You don't sound too excited about going to your reunion. I'm not. I get a stomachache just thinking about it.
local_seq: Are you nervous about meeting up with your ex, Femi?

global_seq: Excuse me. I was wondering how to order office supplies. We have a requisition form on the company web site. What type of supplies do you need? I need paper, ink cartridges, and paper clips. How quickly will you need your supplies?
local_seq: I need all of my supplies right away.

global_seq: We also will have to check your department budget. Do you know how much money you have for office supplies? I will check to see what my budget is. Would you like these supplies delivered or would you like to pick them up? Please deliver them to my office.
local_seq: Fine, well just send the form to us and we will let you know as soon as your supplies come in. Have a good day!

global_seq: Beijing Hotel. May I help you? Yes. I'd like to book a double room with bath. For what time, sir? I plan to arrive on August fifth and leave on August eighth.
local_seq: From August fifth to eighth. Just a moment. Yes, we have a vacancy for that period. What's your name, please?

global_seq: Li Gang. That's OK, Mr. Li, a double room with bath from the fifth of August to the eighth. That's right. By the way, how do you like to pay for it? This hotel prefers cash.
local_seq: I see. When can I receive your confirmation?

global_seq: Excuse me for being late to work. Where have you been? My car broke down. That's too bad. Please try to fix it so that it doesn't happen again.
local_seq: Yes, I'll work on it.

global_seq: Thank you, have a seat. We are working on the new project Great! Fill me in. Let's take a look at the Campbell Project. I don't understand the projected revenues.
local_seq: Let's take another look at it for those of you who don't understand.

global_seq: Hello, this is Steven. May I speak to Mr. Xu? Yes, speaking. I need to make an appointment with you today. OK. What time is it?
local_seq: 3 o'ctock this afternoon.

global_seq: No. Just let me see a doctor. I'm worried about my arm. Be brave, sir. It won't be long. I will fill out the form for you. What is your name? Steve Schliessman. S C H L I E S S M A N. Alright Steve. Your social security number?
Do you have medical insurance? Yes, I do. Blue Cross. Do you have your insurance card with you? No, I don't.
local_seq: Well, you can call it in later. You can phone us.

global_seq: I want to make dinner tonight. What are you thinking of making? I don't have any idea what to cook. How about making a teriyaki bowl?
local_seq: Can you tell me how to make it?

global_seq: All it consists of is teriyaki beef and white rice. Okay, but what do I have to do to prepare it? All you have to do is cook some white rice. What do I do after that?
local_seq: Then cut up the beef and marinate it in teriyaki sauce.

global_seq: Hello, Mr Trent. What can I do for you this afternoon? Actually, Miao Ping, I'm here to close my account with you. I'm going home, the company is transferring me back to London. Oh, I see. When are you leaving? Next week, so I thought it was better to get this all sorted out as soon as possible.
local_seq: Yes, of course. Well, let's get started. Would you show me your passport, please?

global_seq: Can I help you? Yes, I'm looking for a house. To buy or to rent? Oh, to rent.
local_seq: How much do you want to pay?

global_seq: About 300 a month. Well, I've got one here. It's 260 a month. How big is it? It's got a kitchen, a bathroom, and one bedroom.
local_seq: Well, actually I prefer something a bit bigger if that's possible.

global_seq: Yes, I think so. There is also an interesting one. It's opposite the park. How much is it? It's 325 a month. It's the biggest we've got in this area. What's it like?
local_seq: Well, There're two bedrooms, a sitting room, a kitchen and a bathroom.

global_seq: What kind of personality do you think you have? I'm easy to approach and friendly to everyone. Do you think you are introverted or extroverted? I'm quite outgoing, I think.
local_seq: Are you more of a follower or a leader?

global_seq: Can I help you find something? I would like to buy a new fridge. Is there one in particular that you like? I was looking at this Kenmore refrigerator.
local_seq: Ah yes, that is a great refrigerator.

global_seq: What's so great about it? It's both affordable and it comes with all the appliances. What appliances? It comes with an ice maker, water dispenser, and there is a lot of room inside.
local_seq: May I see the inside for myself?

global_seq: Excuse me, does this bus go to the new bookstore? No, you'll have to get off at the bank, and take a No. 50. Thank you. How much is the fare to that stop? One dollar.
local_seq: How many stops are there?

global_seq: Two stops after this one. Could you please tell me when we get there? Sure. By the way, do I need a transfer again after No. 50?
local_seq: No, a No. 50 will take you right there.

global_seq: There is a problem in my apartment. What is it? A pipe broke in my wall, and water is leaking. Is the water causing any damage?
local_seq: Yes, it’ s creating mildew on the walls.

global_seq: I won’ t be able to fix the pipe until tomorrow. I can call a plumber to fix it right now. I’ ll do it for you. Well, you can’ t do it until tomorrow, and I need it fixed now.
local_seq: That’ s true.

global_seq: What are you doing, Victor? I’ m making a list of food and drinks. What for? What for? For the party, of course.
local_seq: Party? What party?

global_seq: We’ re having a Valentine’ s Day Party. Oh, I forget. Who’ s invited? We’ Ve invited all our sophomore friends from school. Can I help you get ready?
local_seq: That’ ll be a big help. Well, here’ s a list of some of the food you could buy.

global_seq: What did you do at the office today? I had a really busy day. I had to work a little overtime. In the morning an important client called to place a large order. I had to check some things with my colleagues before confirming the order. What kind of things did you need to check? The most important thing was to check that we had the goods in stock. If the goods are in stock, we can deliver them immediately. I also had to check the price. This customer is very important, so the
local_seq: I see. Did anything else happen?

global_seq: I received a lot of emails from potential clients that I had to answer. Each time, I had to check files to see what we had agreed at earlier meetings. Each client has different conditions and required It must be difficult to remember the details for each individual client. Yes. That’ s why we have everything on computer files. We don’ t use much paper at our office. After lunch, I had to deal with a complaint form a client. I hate dealing with complaints. Was it a legitimate complaint?
local_seq: Yes, it was. I managed to sort out the problem, but I was tied up with the matter for over an hour.

global_seq: May I help you? My daughter. She is missing. I don’ t know where she is. What dose she look like? She has blond hair and blue eyes.
local_seq: What was she wearing?

global_seq: She has a yellow dress on and red sneakers. When did you last see her? I just saw her down the street. I don’ t know where she is. How long has it been?
local_seq: Oh, it’ s been uh... fifteen minutes.

global_seq: This is my first trip to Hong Kong, and I'd like to see some of the city's sights. Will you be here long? Only three days on business so I won't have a long time. There are many tourist attractions in Hong Kong.
local_seq: Do you have some information on these?

global_seq: How are you doing today? Great. Thank you. What can I do for you? I need to withdraw some money.
local_seq: How much would you like to take out?

global_seq: I need to withdraw $ 300. Which account would you like to take the money from? I want to take it from my checking account. Okay, here you go.
local_seq: Thank you very much.

global_seq: I can’ t believe the cost of apartments in New York City. Oh, you didn’ t know that apartments here are considered valuable, even if they are small and crowded? Of course I had heard about that, but now I know how expensive it is to rent a place here. I don’ t mind paying high rent to live in New York.
local_seq: Why? You pay so much for such a tiny space to live.

global_seq: Would you like me to type it for you? Yes, please. That would be a great help. Are you sure you don’ t mind? Not at all. I’ ll be glad to do it. Thank you very much.
local_seq: Shall I right out again first?

global_seq: Is this the right bus for San Francisco? It sure is.Can I see your ticket? OK, fine. When's the first stop? About two hours out of Los Angeles. Give me the bags, I'll put'em on the bus. Here's your claim tag. Don't lose it.When you get off the bus, give it to me.
local_seq: Thank you.

global_seq: What is the best way to find a job here? There are different ways of conducting a job search. Do you know what you want to do? I don't know. Can you work part-time or full-time?
local_seq: It doesn't matter right now, either one would be OK.

global_seq: The binders have current local jobs listings and the computer jobs lists are good too. Understand? OK, I'll go check it out. Schedule an appointment with a counselor and you can get more information. Would that work for you? I am not sure.
local_seq: Everything that you need for a successful job search is here. Happy job searching!

global_seq: Did you see the news today? I haven't had a chance to see it. You know about the blackout last night, right? The lights were out everywhere.
local_seq: A bunch of people went looting last night.

global_seq: They what? They took full advantage of the lights being out. That's crazy. The news reported that four stores were broken into.
local_seq: Were the looters found?

global_seq: Sir, may I please see your license and registration? Do you know how fast you were going? No, I'm not sure. I think about 65 mph, right? You're not sure? You were going at 90 miles per hour! That's 25 mph over the legal speed limit! Have you been drinking? No, Officer, not at all.
local_seq: Then how can you explain your behavior?

global_seq: Well, I guess I just wasn't paying attention to the speedometer. Not paying attention to the speedometer? Why not? Um, because I was busy talking to my friend. On a cell phone?
local_seq: Yes, I was using a cell phone. I just bought it, so I decided to give my friend a phone call to tell him about it. While I did that I also turned on the radio and was listening to one of my favorite songs, and eating some food I had bought at a fast food restaurant, and, um... guess I had too many distractions.

global_seq: Can I help you, sir? Yes, I'm checking out. Can I have your key and room number, please? Room 1419. Here's my key.
local_seq: Here's your bill, sir. Could you please check it?

global_seq: It's all right. Please charge it to my credit card. Here you are, sir. You're all set. I hope you enjoyed your stay. And that next time you're in town, you will stay with us again. I will. Where can I leave my luggage? I really want to leave after lunch. The bell captain will put it in the storage room. When you're ready to leave, you can claim your luggage from him.
local_seq: Thanks very much. And good-bye.

global_seq: I like the Honda Accord you showed me before. I think it's more practical for my needs. Alright, sir. You are making a good choice.Honda has made a lot of design improvements in the new Accord. What does it come with standard? On all our new cars, the standards includeair conditioning, anti-lock brakes, air bags, and an AM / FM stereo with a CD player.But on the Accord, there is another standard item as well.The Accord com
local_seq: Cruise control? I don't like that.

global_seq: Why not, sir? I think it's dangerous. What if I can't turn it off? Well, sir, I know some of our customers are concerned about cruise control.But Honda has never had a single cruise control malfunction that led to an accident. I wish it didn't have cruise control. My wife doesn't like it either.
local_seq: You know, sir, you don't have to use it.You can turn it on or off. If you don't want to use it, you just never turn it on.

global_seq: I suppose. And what about the sunroof? Is that standard? No, the sunroof is optional, sir. I see. Another important question is the time I can get this car. I need a new car rather soon. Well, I can say that the new models will be here in August.If you order one now, we will have it for you in August.
local_seq: That's good enough, I think. What colors does the new Accord come in?

global_seq: We have this new model in red, white, black, or silver.These are the standard colors.Of course you could specially order from various other colors too. My brother has last year's Accord.And his car is a kind of soft purple color mixed with silver. I really like that color. I wonder if I can get that color on my Accord. I know the color you mean. Is this it, sir? Yes, I think that's it. Can I get that on the Accord?
local_seq: Yes, you can.That color is very popular with Honda buyers. So we've kept it available.

global_seq: Good morning. sir. How may I serve you today? I'd like a cup of mocha. Sure. Large or medium? Medium, please.
local_seq: Anything else to go?

global_seq: Yeah. give me a chocolate bar also. You've got it. Please have them wrapped. I'll take them away. Sure. It's seven eighty-nine.
local_seq: Here's eight dollars. Keep the change.

global_seq: Could I help you on your new project? I have a need for help with writing and also a need for help with the computer work. Which would you prefer? I want to help with both. That would be wonderful. Sometimes we will be working together and sometimes independently. Would that be OK?
local_seq: Most of the time that is what I prefer.

global_seq: We start on Monday. Can you be there? I am not sure yet. I need your background information before the meeting. I will do that.
local_seq: I'll enjoy working with you. Have a great day!

global_seq: To start with, may I know why you are interested in working for our company? First, as far as I know, your company has had an impressive growth record. Second, I want to get into the foreign trade business. Now you are with Quandong Company. What is your chief responsibility there? I'm in charge of marketing activities in South-East Asia, for example, organizing trade conferences and arranging exhibitions.
local_seq: Do you have any questions about the job?

global_seq: What do you want, Essie? A cup of coffee and an apple pie. How about you? I don't want coffee. I'd like some orange juice. Why don't you drink coffee?
local_seq: I don't like coffee in this cafe.

global_seq: What's the problem, sir? I bought this toy gun from your store two weeks ago. My son played with it only twice and it broke. Do you keep the receipt? Yes, and I have the warranty, too.
local_seq: What do you want me to do about it?

global_seq: Alison, would you like to have some more? No, thanks. I've had enough. Actually you haven't had much. To tell you the truth, I am on a diet.
local_seq: That sounds ridiculous. Why?

global_seq: Do you have any tables? Yes. We've got plenty of tables in stock. Will you have a look at this one? It's a nice color, and the style is not bad, but a bit too small. I'd like to get a slightly larger one. How about this one?
local_seq: Mmm, I like it. How much is it?

global_seq: Seventy US dollars. Here is the money. Could you deliver this to my house? Of course. We are always at your service. Here is my name card. Thanks.
local_seq: You are welcome.

global_seq: Well, what did you think about the last candidate? Do you think we should hire her? She had a very impressive resume, but she seemed to lack the confidence that I think a good manager needs. What made you think that she wasn't very confident? Did you notice the way that she avoided making eye contact with us while she talked?
local_seq: She was a bit nervous, I guess. What else?

global_seq: When she first walked into the room to greet us, she didn't shake our hands or introduce herself at all. I thought that was a bit unprofessional. you're right. If she walked into meetings with our clients like that, it would make our company look bad, wouldn't it? It sure would. Did you also notice the way she slouched in her chair during most of the interview? She had horrible posture! I agree. I guess I was paying more attention to her answers than her body language.
local_seq: On top fo all of that, she didn't seem to have any sense about people's personal space. she didn't keep enough distance between us when during the meeting.

global_seq: My throat is really dry. Do you want to go get something to drink? Yes, I'm parched. What did you want to drink?
local_seq: I was thinking about getting a soda.

global_seq: Do you know that soda doesn't quench your thirst? Why not? Soda is really bad for you. I don't know what else to drink.
local_seq: You're supposed to drink water when you're dehydrated.

global_seq: I have a feeling you will get this job. Thanks. But I'm not so sure. Interviews stress me out. Just remember to be professional and polite. Oh, and don’ t forget to smile. I’ ll do my best, but sometimes I have trouble being myself in stressful situations.
local_seq: Have you updated your resume recently?

global_seq: Yes... ah! I forgot to include my e-mail address. You’ d better double-and-triple check it. You don’ t want to have any embarrassing typos on your resume. Otherwise, you might shoot yourself in the foot. I’ ll be sure and do that. I also need to pick out the right suit, shirt, and tie for this interview. Definitely. Oh, do you have a reference letter?
local_seq: Sort of. I prepared a list of all the people who can vouch for my experience and good work ethic.

global_seq: Lindsay Tipping gave me your name as a reference. We are considering hiring her as an editor for our magazine. Lindsay, of course, I will be more than happy to recommend her to you. How long was she employed with your company? She freelanced with us for 3 years. She was always consistent and punctual with her assignments and a pleasure to work with.
local_seq: Freelance, hmm. How do you think she will manage in an office environment?

global_seq: Hello. Do you have anything for a little girl? Well, we have some new Barbie dolls. That's a great idea. Show me the Barbie dolls. Here's one — the new, beautiful Digital Barbie. This doll is hot!
local_seq: How lovely! How much is she?

global_seq: It's only $ 29.95. No problem. Let me have one. That's great. Anything else? No, thank you. That's all I need at the moment.
local_seq: The grand total is $ 32.42. How would you like to pay?

global_seq: I'd like to have internet on my computer. Do you know what kind of internet you would like to get? What are my options? You can either get dial-up or DEL.
local_seq: Which one would you recommend?

global_seq: DEL is the best choice. Why is DEL better? It's a lot better because it doesn't tie up your phone line. What exactly does that mean?
local_seq: Well, with dial-up your internet is connected by your phone line.

global_seq: So, now I need your help again, if you don't mind. I'm taking a date to a restaurant. I'd love to help you! What is your budget for the dinner? She strikes me as being very sophisticated. Only the best will do for her. Well, what do you think about our very own hotel restaurant? It is very upscale, with a three-star rating.
local_seq: I don't want to be cooped up in my own hotel tonight. How about another restaurant?

global_seq: Can I get you any dessert? Yes, I'd like to try the blueberry pie. Excellent choice. ( He brings her the pie. After she finishes, the waiter comes back. ) Would you like anything else? No, I'm stuffed. I'm ready for the check.
local_seq: Here you are. Thank you and have a nice evening.

global_seq: Do you like Barry? No, not very much. He's too ambitious and dishonest. I agree. I like his brother Paul. They are not alike. Yes. They are completely different. Paul is very sociable and much more honest than his brother.
local_seq: What kind of person do you consider yourself to be?

global_seq: I think I'm polite, careful, relaxed and shy. Oh, I don't think you're shy! You are always chatting with new people when we go to a party. Well. Yes, but those people always start talking to me. I never talk to them first.Perhaps I'm not as shy as I think. Anyway, you're certainly not shy! You're right. I love going out and making new friends.
local_seq: So, you'll be at my birthday party on Friday?

global_seq: Have you given the puppies anything to eat today? I fed them earlier today. Great! Could you please bathe them later? Okay, I'll do that later.
local_seq: Thank you! Remember that they go to the vet this Saturday.

global_seq: I came here to get a chest X-ray. I will need you to take your clothes off from the waist up and put on the gown, leaving the opening in the back. What comes next? I will need you to face this glass plate right over here.
local_seq: Should I do anything else?

global_seq: Your arms need to be raised to shoulder height. Is this OK? So far, so good. How come you are walking away?
local_seq: I am not leaving. I just need you to take a really deep breath, hold it, and then let it out.

global_seq: Do you have a free moment? Sure, what do you need? I am having some trouble. How do you use this printer? Well. First you have to turn this switch on.
local_seq: Silly me.

global_seq: I would like to buy one round trip plane ticket to Hong Kong, please. For what days, madam? Leaving on September 5th and returning to New York City on October 9th. Do you prefer an aisle or a window seat?
local_seq: I prefer to sit next to a window.

global_seq: Body language in the interview is closely related to the job-hunter's image. Surely it is. You should look the interviewer in the eye so as to show that you are carefully listening to him. You can nod or ask questions at the right time to show that you have already understood or you are quite interested in his words.
local_seq: When you are seated, bent forward a little with your hands crossed, to show you respect the interviewer.

global_seq: Don't move from time to time. It is very impolite and will make you nervous. Proper posture can show your confidence. The best would be you have a smile on your face in the interview to win a good impression of the interviewer. Pay attention to keeping eye contact as well.
local_seq: Throughout the interview you should maintain patience.

global_seq: Hello, Elizabeth. How are you? Fine, thanks. Are you sure you're all right? You look a bit worried today. Is anything wrong? Well, yes, there is something wrong actually. Perhaps you can give me some advice.
local_seq: Of course, if I can.

global_seq: Well, last night when I returned from the theatre, I found that I'd lost my wallet. Oh dear! That's terrible! What was in your wallet? Well, some money. of course, my visa, all my identity cards and some photos. Well, if were you, I'd go to the police station straight away and report it.
local_seq: Yes, I've already done that, and they said they'd look for it. But we're leaving soon and I need my visa and identity cards badly.

global_seq: Oh dear! What a pity! Are you sure you lost the wallet in the theatre? Yes, quite sure. I think you should put an advertisement in the China Daily, saying when and where you lost it. But that takes too long.
local_seq: Wait a minute! My uncle lives in Beijing and he lives very close to the theatre. I'll telephone him and ask him to go there to inquire about it. You'd better have breakfast now and I'll meet you later.

global_seq: Hi, Francis, morning! How are you doing today? I had a bad start of the day. I was stuck in a bad traffic jam on my way and I missed my morning meeting. Indeed, I agree that is not a good start. How about the meeting? You missed anything important? It is ok. My boss briefs me later on.
local_seq: Was he unhappy with you not attending the meeting?

global_seq: is that your rabbit? yes, I just adopted her from the humane society this weekend. that's good of you. why did you decide to get a rabbit. well, i wanted to get a pet that wouldn't disturb the neighbors. at the same time, I wanted a pet that would be affectionate.
local_seq: rabbits aren't usually that affectionate, are they?

global_seq: if you cuddle them a lot when they are very young, they can be just as affectionate as dogs or cats. i didn't know that. Are rabbits difficult to take care of? not really. I went to the veterinarian to get her vaccinated and she told me that all I needed to do was to make sure to trim its nails from time to time, to give her food and water, and to clean its that sounds pretty easy. Do rabbits make your house smell?
local_seq: No, rabbits aren't very stinky. As long as your clean the cage on a regular basis, it's not too bad.

global_seq: Excuse me, but could you tell me if this bus goes to the National History Museum? No, it doesn't. There's no through bus to the National History Museum, madam. I see. Where do I have to change then? You can transfer Fuchengmen.
local_seq: How far is it?

global_seq: Excuse me, do you go to the Central Park? Yes, this is the right bus. Could you please tell me when I get to the Central Park? Don't worry. I'll call out the stops.
local_seq: ( A few minutes later. ) Should I get off at the next stop?

global_seq: No, don't worry. I'll get you off when you get there. Is it a long ride? No, not that long. Two more stops, and you'll get off, sir. OK. I know. Thank you.
local_seq: Not at all.
