local_seq: Silence is golden. Just don't say anything ; otherwise the situation could become worse. I do, however, accept constructive criticism.

global_seq: What do you find frustrating in a work situation? Sometimes, the narrow-minded people make me frustrated. How do you handle your conflict with your colleagues in your work? I will try to present my ideas in a more clear and civilized manner in order to get my points across.
local_seq: To secure employment hopefully with your company.

global_seq: Can you give me a hand with some things in the kitchen? I don’ t think I can finish everything in time. Ok, what do you want me to do? First of all, I need you to do the drying up. I’ m almost finished the washing up. I’ m going to clean the cooker when I finish. Ok. I’ ll put the plates and cutlery away as I dry them. Where is the tea towel? Oh, here it is.
local_seq: We’ ll have this finished in no time with two if us working on it.

global_seq: While you’ re cleaning the cooker, I’ ll wipe the worktop. That was a great meal, by the way. Actually, it was just some leftovers from yesterday. I made far too much food to eat alone. I am glad you could come over to help me finish it. My pleasure! This tea towel’ s a little ragged. Do you have another one? Yes. Look in that drawer. I should throw the old one out.
local_seq: Keep it and use it as rag. You can clean your bicycle with it.

global_seq: May I take your order? We'd like this course for two, please. I'm afraid this course is for four persons. Well, can't you make it for two only?
local_seq: I'm afraid not, sir.

global_seq: I see. Well, what do you recommend then? I would recommend a soup with two or three small dishes. Right, we'll have these three. Would you like rice with your meal?
local_seq: No, thanks.

global_seq: I'd like to pay my bill now. Your name and room number, please? Tom Wilson in Room 306. Have you used any hotel services this morning?
local_seq: No.

global_seq: Mom, did you see Andy's dog? Honey, don't tell me that you want a pet dog also. Mom, please. Can I have a pet dog like Andy's? Honey, you know, we don't have enough room for a pet dog.
local_seq: Mom, we can keep it on the balcony, right?

global_seq: Fill it up, PLS. Premium or regular, Madam? Premium, PLS. Could you check my tyres, too? I think they need air. No problem, Madam. Should I check the air in the spare tyre as well?
local_seq: I don't think so. It's brand-new.

global_seq: Should I clean the windshield for you? Yes, PLS. I also need you to check the oil and the radiator. All right, Madam. It's ok. There is hardly any water in the radiator. It's dangerous, Madam. You could break down, because of the heat you know. Pls fill it up with water then.
local_seq: Anything you say, Madam.

global_seq: Hello, sir. Have you reserved already? No, is there a single room left? Yes, how long will you intend to stay? For a week or so. Do you give discount for a week or more?
local_seq: Yes, we give 5 % discount for a week and 12 % for 2 weeks.

global_seq: Hello, what can I do for you? Um... Hello, I would like to open an account. OK! What kind of account do you want to open? I want to open a current account.
local_seq: I will open it for you right now.

global_seq: What's the minimum deposit for opening a current account? It's 10 yuan. How much money do you want to deposit? Well, here's 3,000 yuan. Please write down your name, address and the amount of your deposit here. And please choose a passcode of six numbers and confirm it.
local_seq: OK, here you are.

global_seq: Thank you. Please confirm your information and sign your name in the blank. Done! What else should I do? That's all. Here's your bank card, and here's the certificate of deposit. Bring your bank card with you every time you come to deposit or withdraw money. OK. Thanks. Goodbye!
local_seq: Bye!

global_seq: Good morning.Wilson Association. This is Mr Brown speaking. I'd like to speak to Mr. Thomas, please. I'm sorry, but Mr.Thomas left the office a few minutes ago. That's bad! I've been trying to call him for the last ten minutes, but your line has been busy.Will he be back soon?
local_seq: I'm afraid not.He ' s gone for the rest of the day.

global_seq: Is there anywhere I can reach him? I don't believe so.He ' s going out of town on business.May I take a message? I have a business appointment with him for tomorrow morning at ten o'clock, but I'm afraid I can't make it. Would you care to make another appointment?
local_seq: Unfortunately, I'm leaving town rather unexpectedly, and I may be gone for several days.

global_seq: Hello, may I speak to Alice please? This is she. How's it going? I've been trying to call you all day. Sorry about that. I was cleaning up.
local_seq: It's okay.

global_seq: So what were you calling me about? Oh, I just wanted to see if you wanted to hang out tomorrow. Sure, what did you want to do? Maybe we can go see a movie or something.
local_seq: That sounds like fun. Let's do it.

global_seq: Sir, may I please see your license and registration? Do you know how fast you were going? No, I’ m not sure. I think about 65 mph, right? You’ re not sure? You were going at 90 miles per hour! That’ s 25 mph over the legal speed limit! Have you been drinking? No, Officer, not at all.
local_seq: Then how can you explain your behavior?

global_seq: Well, I guess I just wasn’ t paying attention to the speedometer. Not paying attention to the speedometer? Why not? Um, because I was busy talking to my friend. On a cell phone?
local_seq: Yes, I was using a cell phone. I just bought it, so I decided to give my friend a phone call to tell him about it. While I did that I also turned on the radio and was listening to one of my favorite songs, and eating some food I had bought at a fast food restaurant, and, um... guess I had too many distractions.

global_seq: I want to take part in the bus tour. When does the bus leave? Let me see, in 5 minuets. That's fine. I don't have much time to waste. Don't worry. The bus tour is really worth while. You can enjoy the whole city in a single day.
local_seq: How long does the tour last?

global_seq: Good morning. My name is John Smith. I'm an import manager. How do you do, Mr. Smith? My name is Thou Hong. Nice to meet You, Ms. Thou. We've learned that you specialize in the export of electronic products. Will you please take a seat? Mr. Smith, have you seen the display of our electronic products in the exhibition hall downstairs?
local_seq: Yes. I had a look just now. I found some of the exhibits of excellent quality and beautiful design. I feel we

global_seq: Could we have the honor of you presence of the meeting? I'm awfully sorry, I have other plan. Would you prefer some other time? I'd love to come other time if it can be arranged.
local_seq: Are you quite sure you can come next Tuesday?

global_seq: I wish it was a nicer day today. That is true. I hope it doesn't rain. It wouldn't rain in the middle of the summer. It wouldn't seem right if it started raining right now.
local_seq: It would be weird if it started raining in ninety degree weather.

global_seq: Any rain right now would be pointless. That's right, it really would be. I want it to cool down some. I know what you mean, I can't wait until it's winter.
local_seq: Winter is great. I wish it didn't get so cold sometimes though.

global_seq: I would rather deal with the winter than the summer. I feel the same way. I wish it was a nicer day today. That is true. I hope it doesn't rain.
local_seq: It wouldn't rain in the middle of the summer.

global_seq: It wouldn't seem right if it started raining right now. It would be weird if it started raining in ninety degree weather. Any rain right now would be pointless. That's right, it really would be.
local_seq: I want it to cool down some.

global_seq: Hello, Could you please connect me to Mr. Cook's office? It is on Line Three. I'm afraid you've got the wrong extension number. Oh. Then I don't know what his number is. Can you check it for me? OK. Hold on, please.
local_seq: OK. Thank you.

global_seq: Anything else, sir? That's all for now. How much do I owe you? That'll be fifty-five dollars and twenty cents. Can't you make it a little cheaper?
local_seq: Oh, no, sir. We already gave you a discount on each item.

global_seq: I have to find a living room set. Where are you planning on looking for one? I don't know. I can tell you where I got mine.
local_seq: Where did you go to find yours?

global_seq: IKEA has beautiful furniture. Does the furniture from IKEA cost a lot? The furniture cost a couple thousand dollars. How good of quality is the furniture?
local_seq: It's very sturdy. You get what you pay for.

global_seq: I need to order new business cards. Do you have any idea how many you'd like? I think 2,000 would be enough. Would you fill out this form, please?
local_seq: I don't want to make any changes to my old card.

global_seq: If you detect any difference, I'll take you out to dinner. ... Okay, that's it. Here's the form, and here's my old card to use as a model. Thank you. Your order will be ready seven days from now. I need it sooner. Let me have it in three days, okay?
local_seq: We can certainly give you faster turnaround, but it will cost you extra.

global_seq: Can I help you? Yes. I sent in my resume at the end of last week. I'm applying for the accounts assistant position. May I have your name please? My name is Judy Liao. That's spelled L I A O.
local_seq: Alright... And did you have some specific questions about your application?

global_seq: Not really. I was in the neighborhood, and I just wanted to stop in to see if you received my resume. Oh, that's no problem. Just give me a moment, and I can check.Judy Liao. Let's see... Yes, here it is. Judy Liao. We have received your resume. Thank you. Is there anything else I can help you with?
local_seq: Yes, maybe. The ad in the newspaper said you wanted the resume, a cover letter, and two letters of recommendation. I included those things in the envelope. Is there anything else I should send?

global_seq: No, that is all we need. If we have those things included, that is sufficient. Do you know when they will start setting up interviews for the job? I'm not really sure about that. But I know we are still receiving resumes.Maybe after a week or two they will start calling applicants. I see. Well, thank you very much for helping me. You have been very helpful.
local_seq: If you have any further questions, you can call any time.

global_seq: I have applied for a transfer. Really? Do you mean that you are leaving? Yes. I think it's time to move on. I’ Ve already been here too long. Where do you want to go?
local_seq: Well, I want to be transferred to the Shanghai office.

global_seq: Would you give me some fruits? How much are these oranges? Seventy cents a piece. How about this one? Sixty cents a piece.
local_seq: Well, I'll take five of the seventy cent ones, and those grapefruits sweet?

global_seq: I'm looking for some fresh produce that's on sale. Well, we just got in some mangoes. Mangoes. What are they? Well, it's a fruit with a big nut in it.
local_seq: Can you eat the nut?

global_seq: No, you peel off the skin and throw out the nut. How much are they? Well, the sale price is $ 1 each. What does a mango taste like?
local_seq: They're like a citrus fruit.

global_seq: Laura told me today that she has a friend with a car for sale. Oh, she did? Then it's a used car of course. Yes, it's used, but she said it was in very good shape.It ' s a small foreign car. What else did she tell you? Did she tell you how many miles there are on it?
local_seq: She thinks it has about twenty-five or thirty thousand miles.

global_seq: That's not bad.What about the price? Did she tell you how much her friend wants for the car? Three thousand dollars. Three thousand! That's almost too good to be true.Did she say why her friend wants to sell it? He lives in the city and you know how expensive it is to keep a car in the city.
local_seq: Well, we can see it for ourselves.Did she tell you when we can go and look at it?

global_seq: Do you know a bus I can take from Altadena to downtown LA? I believe you can take the 486. Will that bus really take me to LA? It sure will.
local_seq: Is it a very long ride?

global_seq: It's a forty-five minute to an hour ride. Really? It doesn't take long at all Do a lot of people ride that bus?
local_seq: More people start getting on around LA.

global_seq: How is your English ability? Not bad. I’ m proficient in both written and spoken English. English and computer skills are comparatively important to this position, especially in the starting period. What’ s your ability in these two fields? I passed College English Test Band 6, with good skill in listening, speaking, reading, and writing. I haven't got any certificate of computer skills, because I don’ t think certificates are necessary if what’ s needed is merely operating a computer. I think practically, to know how to use a computer is more important. And I am quite familiar with Microsoft Office.
local_seq: What else do you have to prove your English ability?

global_seq: Now, Mr.William, a little personal information first, are you married? Yes. I am. Actually my wife is a teacher. What's your major? German.
local_seq: How long have you been study in German?

global_seq: Since I first met my wife, about three years. And just one more question, would you like to be an interpreter? Yes, I’ d like to do that. Very good, you can come here to work next month.
local_seq: Thank you.

global_seq: I have read your resume.What is your last job? I've worked in the Production Department for two years. Could you introduce your biggest accomplishments in your last job? Working with my colleagues, we were able to increase the production efficiency by 5 %.
local_seq: Great! Could you tell me your educational background?

global_seq: Yes. I got a bachelor's degree in English from Beijing University. Why are you willing to work for our company? I can get more promotion in your company. OK, that's all. We'll inform you in two days.
local_seq: Thank you.

global_seq: But how did you know I was working for WebTracker? When I was in LA, I met the WebTracker sales rep. He couldn't have told you. Only a few people at WebTracker know about me. The sales rep had a green note pad just like yours. He said everybody at WebTracker used them.
local_seq: I can't believe it. I can't believe I fell into your trap.

global_seq: There are something wrong with my computer. Really, what's wrong with it? The computer doesn't work when I push the power cotton. Oh, do you use your computer often?
local_seq: Yes, I don't know why it doesn't work this time.

global_seq: Don't worry. Have you got receipt with you? Yeah! We'll go to your house and repair it on Tuesday.Ok? OK, I'll expected you around 2 o'clock?
local_seq: See you then.

global_seq: Hello, sir, what can I do for you today? Hello, I need a new suit. I have an important interview next week, so I really need to look sharp. No problem! We have a broad selection of suits, all tailored made so that it will fit perfectly. Great! I want a three piece suit, preferably made from Italian cashmere or wool.
local_seq: Very well sir. Would you like to have some shirts made also?

global_seq: Tommy played truant today. His teacher called me this morning. Where did he go? I've asked him, but he won't tell me. What should we do about this? He is like you. I remember when we were at the college, you always skipped classes. Like me? But you see I am so successful now. And if he is really like me, he will be more successful than me in the future.
local_seq: Stop, stop... We are talking about our son's attendance for classes and his study. Maybe we could give him a little bit money to pay to go to school.

global_seq: Okay, so let’ s go over everything one more time. I really want you to get this job! I know! It’ s an amazing growth opportunity! They’ re true industry leaders, and it would be so interesting to be part of an organization that is the undisputed leader in business process platform development. So, let’ s see, you did your research on the company, right? Well, I visited their website and read up on what they do. They’ re an IT service company that offers comprehensive business solutions for large corporations. They provide services such as ARM development, and they also offer customdesigned applications.
local_seq: So what would your role in the company?

global_seq: Susan, good evening.Why are you so dressed up? I'm on my way out to a New Year's banquet.How do I look? Is my make-up ok? You look great.Your make-up is perfect. Do your think I should wear a different dress?
local_seq: No, the one you have on looks fabulous, especially with your hair like that.

global_seq: Thanks for saying.Do you have any ideas which necklace I should wear? With that dress I'd like to say your white diamond necklace would look perfect. Thanks for helping out.Now Im ready, what are you doing tonight? Not much, Just a house party with some friends.
local_seq: Sounds fun.Anyone I know?

global_seq: Hi, is this the Resume Writing Workshop? Yes, this is the Resume Writing Workshop. Welcome! I really don’ t know that much about putting together a resume. It’ s easy. Don’ t worry about it.
local_seq: What’ s the most important part?

global_seq: Well, the most important thing we need to do is make sure that our name and contact information are across the top. What comes next? You can either list your job experience next or your education--whichever is the most impressive should be first. Can I list my interests next?
local_seq: Sure, that would be a good place for them.

global_seq: Confronted with difficult questions in an interview, the job-hunters mostly will be at a loss about what to do. Usually, you cannot prepare for these questions in advance and have to depend on your immediate performance. Still, there are some rules to follow. In this case, you should first keep calm and normal to the face.
local_seq: Don't get nervous and freaked out.

global_seq: Formulate a satisfactory answer based on your specific situation. There should be neither too much silence nor hasty answers Try to show the best of yourself with decent words and manners. Don't be discouraged even when confronted with negative questions
local_seq: You should admit your weakness frankly.

global_seq: Mom, is there anything in the fridge I can eat before dinner? There's some leftover pizza from last night. Anything else? Um, I think there may be some leftover lasagna from the other day.
local_seq: Do I have any other choices?

global_seq: Nice to see you ; how have you been feeling lately? I have been feeling great, Dr. Smith. I am happy that you have decided to come in for your annual physical. Yes, I am going on a cross-country bike ride on vacation and want to make sure that I don’ t have any problems.
local_seq: We are going to look at your heart and lungs, do a few blood tests, and see that your eyes, ears, and nose are all working as they should.

global_seq: I’ Ve been having trouble with congestion in my chest. Can you give me some tests for that? I can do a chest X-ray to check for congestion. That would be great. What is the blood test for? The blood test is for cholesterol, white blood cell count, and blood sugar.
local_seq: I have been feeling great. I don’ t imagine that any of my tests will turn out badly.

global_seq: Excuse me. I need to refill this prescription. It says on the bottle here that you can have two refills. Yes, I need to refill it today. Alright. I'm sorry, Miss. According to our file, this prescription has already been refilled twice.
local_seq: I was worried about that. I couldn't remember if I had it refilled twice yet or not.

global_seq: Well, it looks like you have.You will need to see your doctor to get a new prescription. Listen. This is an emergency. I tried to call my doctor, but he is out of town. So I can't see him in time. I need this medicine. It is for skin condition. I've run out.Can you just refill it once more? I'm sorry, Miss. We can't do it. We must follow the prescription.And this prescription has run out. But I need it. Please. Refill it for me just this once. I can go to the doctor around ten days from now. Then I'll have another prescription.
local_seq: Miss, I understand your problem.But it is against the law for us to sell certain medicines without a prescription.It ' s the law. I can't do anything about it.We never sell medicine unless we have a proper prescription. Never.

global_seq: But I have a prescription. I just need more of it. A prescription must be valid. It cannot be an expired prescription. I'm sorry, Miss. It's the law.You will have to find another doctor who will prescribe this for you. Oh, it will be so expensive! I have a special medical plan, and I can only see one doctor.It will cost me a lot of money to see another doctor. Miss, I just can't help you on this. I'm a pharmacist, not a doctor. And there are other customers I need to help now. I know it is frustrating when this happens.But there is nothing I can do about it. I'm sorry.
local_seq: This is ridiculous! In Taiwan, it is much easier to get medicine when I need it.

global_seq: Hi, Tom! This is Marry with Hans furniture store. Yes, Marry? I just wanted to let you to know that we had decided to offer the sales position to someone else. I see.
local_seq: We considered you very carefully but the other candidate has more experience.

global_seq: I want to get on the bus already. It just isn't on time today. It was supposed to be here thirty minutes ago. I think it'll be here pretty soon.
local_seq: I need to get to work, so it better.

global_seq: I really do hate public transportation. I agree, it's just never on time. That's right. I also hate having to stand at a bus stop in all kinds of weather.
local_seq: Oh, that's the worst.

global_seq: Where is my back pack? I don't know. Where did you leave it? I just put it on the chair a while ago, but now it's gone. Are you sure?
local_seq: Of course, I am sure. I bet someone stole it.

global_seq: What would you like today? Let me get a hamburger. Do you want cheese on it? No cheese.
local_seq: Can I get you something to drink?

global_seq: Can I get a soda, please? What kind do you want? I'd like a Sprite. Would you like anything else?
local_seq: I'd like a bag of Doritos with that.

global_seq: May I help you? Yes. I'd like to see one of those ties. You mean this one? Yes.
local_seq: It's pretty, isn't it? It's made of pure silk and it's on sale.

global_seq: How long is the warranty? We guarantee our product for two years. How about the repairs after the warranty expire? Are you responsible for the fixing if the machine breaks down after the warranty period? Yes. All repairs are billed at cost. We'll only bill you for parts. The on-site service is $ 300 a year after the warranty.
local_seq: Will you supply spare parts if we want them?

global_seq: Could you show me how to operate this fax machine? I am going to receive some urgent fax from a company. Of course. Let me check it. Firstly, don't be frustrated about all the buttons on it. That's right. After overcoming these buttons, you should check whether there is any paper in the machine, you must make sure this.
local_seq: I couldn't agree more.

global_seq: And then prepare what you want to receive. If you want to send a photograph, you must copy one. What can I do next? The next thing you should do is to wait. The sender will give you the fax. Look. Some of the faxes come through blurred. What is wrong with it?
local_seq: Maybe we should call its after-service man.

global_seq: Mom, am I like a superman? All I need is a cape. No, just a super-boy. Mom, you always think of me as a child. Yes, because a real man doesn't need Mom to worry about him so much. He can do things by himself.
local_seq: Sure!

global_seq: Oh, my poor Danny, sure, you are a man. But you know, running like this in street is very dangerous. Superman is not afraid of any danger. Do you remember the rules of road safety? What?
local_seq: Walk the sidewalk and please right-hand side.

global_seq: Read Jimmy's card to me please, Janey. I have just arrived in Scotland and I'm staying at a Youth Hostel. Eh? He says he's just arrived in Scotland. He says he's staying at a Youth Hostel. You know he's a member of the Y. H. A.
local_seq: The what?

global_seq: The Y. H. A., mun. The Youth Hostel's Association. What else does he say? I'll write a letter soon. I hope you are all well. What? Speak up, Janey. I'm afraid I can't hear you.
local_seq: He says he'll write a letter soon. He hopes we are all well. Love, Jimmy.

global_seq: What's the best way downtown? Let me see. It depends. Depends? Depends on what? If you are in a hurry, you should take a taxi.
local_seq: Is that expensive?

global_seq: Hello, police office? Yes, May I help you? Yes, I'd like to report a case. Somebody broke into my house. When did that happen?
local_seq: It happened in the morning. I just came home from work and found the lock broken.

global_seq: Is anything lost? I don't know. I called the police as soon as I found the lock broken. OK, we will send some men as soon as possible. Please be quick.
local_seq: OK, we will. What's your name and address?

global_seq: Excuse me. This chicken doesn't taste right to me. What seems to be the problem? How should I know? It's just kind of cold in the middle. It just doesn't taste right. Do you want to try it? Well, let me get that out of your way. Would you like to order something else from the menu? Or I could bring you another order of chicken if you'd like.
local_seq: Another one? I don't want another one. Give me something simple. You've got steak, right?

global_seq: Hello, may I help you? Yes, I'd like to have this parcel delivered to Shanghai. Oh, we only take care of mail. For parcels, you can go to the next window. Thanks!... Hello, I have a parcel to deliver.
local_seq: Where do you need it to be delivered to?

global_seq: I want to post it to Shanghai. OK, please fill out this form. Sure, what's the postcode of Shanghai? Wait a moment, let me check it out for you. It's 200085.
local_seq: Thanks, here you go. What's the postage, please?

global_seq: Grandpa, this seat is for you, for you are the eldest person here and also it's your birthday today. Oh, you are such a good child today. Come here. Sit next to me. I'm afraid I can't do that. It's Dad's seat, according to the book about table manners. Oh, you read? Very good. Then, I think we should do something different today. I'll give you some privilege.
local_seq: Great. That's my favorite seat which will be the nearest to the birthday cake.

global_seq: Marketing manage office, can I help you? Mr Green, please. Sorry, he's out. What time you suspect back them?
local_seq: Sorry, I am not sure, can I take a message?

global_seq: Excuse me, where is the nearest gas station? Go along this street to the traffic lights. To the traffic lights? That's right, and turn left at the lights.
local_seq: Left at the lights?

global_seq: How far do we have to go? About 50 miles. The traffic is not very heavy on this high way, is it? So I’ m sure we’ ll make it. No, but we’ Ve got a hurry. It will be the rush hour soon.
local_seq: Don’ t worry. There’ s plenty of time yet.

global_seq: I'm taking a date to a restaurant, so could you please direct me to a good one? But of course! How much are you thinking of spending on dinner? She deserves nothing but the best, of course. In that case, I would suggest our own hotel restaurant. The chef, the food, and the service are outstanding.
local_seq: I promised her I would take her out to a restaurant. Do you have another one in mind?

global_seq: The City Bank. May I help you, sir? Yes, I'd like to close my account. May I have your name, please? Adam Smith.
local_seq: Alright, what's your address?

global_seq: 56 Edison Ave, Apartment 39, Los Angeles. When would you like your account closed? Next Friday. Okay. Where would you like to have your last bill sent to you?
local_seq: 14 May flower Ave, Los Angeles.

global_seq: Have you bought your bus pass yet? I didn't get it yet. Well, why not? I have no idea where to get it from.
local_seq: You should've just asked me.

global_seq: Well then, where do I get it? You can get it from the student business office. I didn't know that. I know you didn't.
local_seq: I appreciate you telling me.

global_seq: Welcome to Lincoln Bank. Are you a new customer? Yes, I am. I opened an account with you about a month ago, but today I'm here to see about a loan of some kind. I see. As you don't have a long history with us, we will have to check your credit rating with your previous bank before we can promise any loan to you. Yes, that's fine. My credit is good ; I banked at my former bank for many years.
local_seq: May I ask why you decided to switch your account to us?

global_seq: Are you ready to order, sir? Yeah. I have a fancy for some wine tonight. Can you recommend something for me? Our red wine is very famous. I'd suggest you try that. All right. What kind of red wine do you serve?
local_seq: Here are a variety of red wines for you to choose. You can have a taste then make your decision then. Here is the wine menu.

global_seq: The dry red wine looks quite good. I'd like to try this one. Then do you like any cheese to go with it? Why? Do I have to order that? Oh, no. But cheese is the best thing to go with red wine. And we have really fresh cheese which will be free if you order red wine. Here are the pictures. Pick out something you like.
local_seq: That's really nice. I'd like this one. It looks very attractive.

global_seq: What would you like for appetizer and dinner? Croissant for appetizer and two beef steaks for dinner. How do you want your steaks, rare, medium or well-done? Medium, please?
local_seq: Anything for dessert?

global_seq: In foreign trade, language differences are very important. Yes. If people can not communicate with each other easily, they can not understand each other's way of thinking. Fortunately, there is a widely-spoken commercial language, namely English. Many exporters speak French and German as well.
local_seq: In South America, the most common language is Spanish and Portuguese.

global_seq: May I have the bill, please? Here is it. How much altogether? The total amount is $ 185.
local_seq: Does it include the charge for drinks?

global_seq: Thank you for seeing me. Did you look over my letter and resume? Yes. Quite good. Perhaps you're very interested in the social benefits. Yes, I think it is possible more important than the salary. Really? We would like to start you off at 2,000 yuan a month, excluding bonus and overtime pay.
local_seq: Good, about the essential living conditions?

global_seq: Well, we'll supply you with an apartment of a bedroom and a living room. I see. I'm a female. Are there any special benefits for me? Yes, in our company, the women have a two-week vacation a year, besides this, if you are a married woman, maternity leave for some months is permitted. I think it is very necessary for us. I wonder whether I am on holiday with payment every year.
local_seq: Yes, you have a paid month holiday every year.

global_seq: Hello, this is Lucy from ABC Company. Hello, Lucy. I’ m calling to see if you have made your decision. You are the right person we are seeking for. Yes, I have decided to work with your company.
local_seq: Good news for us. When can you start to work?

global_seq: Good morning, what can I do for you? I want to buy a car to facilitate my life. But I don't have enough money. Could you supply a loan to me? Oh, I see. Would you mind telling me your monthly salary? Sure. 7,000 yuan per month.
local_seq: OK. We can supply you a loan. How much do you want to loan?

global_seq: 200,000 yuan. By the way, what about the interest rate? It's only 4.5 % for one-year loan. Do you want to apply now? Yes, I think so. OK. Please fill out this loan application.
